translation.en: Mom says we have to be polite to her dates...
translation.zh: 妈妈说我们要对她的约会对象礼貌点

translation.en: ...and we will if he makes it to the door.
translation.zh: 如果他能走到门口的话 我们会的

translation.en: -Merry Christmas, sucker. -And don't come back for Kwanzaa.
translation.zh: -圣诞快乐 蠢货-宽扎节别再来了

translation.en: Think you're going out with our mama?
translation.zh: 你以为你能跟我们的妈妈约会吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna get you two.
translation.zh: 我要抓住你们两个

translation.en: Get me out of here!
translation.zh: 放我出去

translation.en: Lindsey, you really think Dad's coming back?
translation.zh: 琳赛 你真的觉得爸爸会回来吗？

translation.en: Any day now. But until then, we have to keep Mom available.
translation.zh: 随时都可能 但在那之前我们得让妈妈保持单身

translation.en: Problem is, she's just too pretty.
translation.zh: 问题是她长得太漂亮了

translation.en: That just makes our job a whole lot tougher.
translation.zh: 这让我们的工作困难了很多

translation.en: Sometimes I feel sorry for her.
translation.zh: 有时我为她感到遗憾

translation.en: Well, I feel sorry for the next sucker who tries to put the moves on her.
translation.zh: 我为下一个想对她采取行动的蠢货感到遗憾

translation.en: -Mr. Persons. -My man. What you got for me?
translation.zh: -珀森斯先生-伙计 你给我准备了什么？

translation.en: -I'll get the door for you. -Got that new-car smell, you know?
translation.zh: -我去给你开门-它有新车的味道 你知道吗？

translation.en: This puppy's missing one thing.
translation.zh: （林肯 导航与音频） 这辆车缺了一件东西

translation.en: Welcome to the big leagues, Satch. Let's make it happen.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到大联盟 萨奇 我们出发吧

translation.en: Look at this ride. Parchment leather with the satin nickel trim.
translation.zh: 看看这座椅 羊皮和拉丝镍面装饰

translation.en: Look out, ladies, here we come. Holla.
translation.zh: 当心点 姑娘们 我们来了

translation.en: Nick Persons. How's it going, man?
translation.zh: 尼克珀森斯 你好吗？伙计

translation.en: How's it look?
translation.zh: 看起来好吗？

translation.en: Keep driving, fool. That's the one that sicced her dog on you.
translation.zh: 继续开车 笨蛋 就是她放狗咬你的

translation.en: What? You want some of this, huh? You want a piece of me?
translation.zh: 怎么？你想这样吗？你想让我揍你吗？

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. Six thousand pounds of respect.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 太让人羡慕了

translation.en: -Yeah. It's nice, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊 这车不错吧？

translation.en: -Take it for a spin? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -没错-想开一圈吗？

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: -想-不行

translation.en: -Man, what did that unit set you back? -I got a good deal on it.
translation.zh: 伙计 这车花了你多少钱？ 我得到了很好的折扣

translation.en: Right. Your payments probably cost more than my car.
translation.zh: 好吧 你的分期款可能比我的车还贵

translation.en: Marty, my shoes cost more than your car.
translation.zh: 马蒂 我的鞋都比你的车贵

translation.en: Look, Nick, here come your favorite customers.
translation.zh: 看 尼克 你最爱的客人来了

translation.en: -Hey, mister, you got any Yu-Gi-Oh? -What you think?
translation.zh: -先生 你这有《游戏王》吗？-你觉得呢？

translation.en: You got any Dragon Ball GT?
translation.zh: 你这有《龙珠GT》吗？

translation.en: Look, you come in here every day asking the same questions.
translation.zh: 听着 你们每天都来问同样的问题

translation.en: We ain't got no Pokémon, no Digimon, no Buffy, no SpongeBob...
translation.zh: 我们没《口袋妖怪》、《数码宝贝》《吸血鬼猎人巴菲》或《海绵宝宝》

translation.en: ...no Beanie Babies and no shoplifters.
translation.zh: 也没有豆豆公仔和商店扒手

translation.en: Now, get! Both of y'all, get!
translation.zh: 现在滚出去 你们都滚出去

translation.en: You better get. You better get out of here.
translation.zh: 快点 你们最好赶紧走

translation.en: -You got a way with kids. -They're like cockroaches...
translation.zh: 你对付小孩真有一套 他们就像蟑螂一样

translation.en: ...except you can't squish them.
translation.zh: 但是你不能拍死他们

translation.en: -You gonna clean that? -I don't do windows.
translation.zh: -你能去收拾一下吗？-我不擦窗户

translation.en: What? It'll dry.
translation.zh: 怎么了？会干的

translation.en: People wanna know why I hate kids.
translation.zh: 人们想知道我为什么讨厌小孩

translation.en: What's the matter with you?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？

translation.en: -I think I'm in love. -Love? No....
translation.zh: -我觉得我恋爱了-恋爱？不

translation.en: What do you mean, love?
translation.zh: 恋爱了是什么意思？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's the new girl from the party-planning place. Yikes.
translation.zh: 对 那是新来的做宴会计划的姑娘

translation.en: -She's so fine. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -她真美-没错

translation.en: -Man, I got to get with that. -Whoa, whoa. She's a divorcée, man.
translation.zh: -伙计 我要去追她-她离过婚 朋友

translation.en: That's way too much baggage for a guy like you.
translation.zh: 她太多包袱 配不上你这种人

translation.en: Don't be so quick to judge people, man.
translation.zh: （精英宴会计划） 别轻易给人下结论 伙计

translation.en: This isn't the Nick the Quick that I know.
translation.zh: 这不是我认识的快手尼克

translation.en: -Hey, I had broccoli yesterday. -So?
translation.zh: -我昨天吃了花椰菜-所以呢？

translation.en: Sometimes you got to try something new, my friend.
translation.zh: 有时候你必须尝试新事物 朋友

translation.en: Look and learn.
translation.zh: 学着点

translation.en: -Mom! Mom! -Mom! Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈…

translation.en: -How was school? -I got 100 on my test.
translation.zh: -今天在学校怎么样？-我的拼写考试得了100分

translation.en: -Big deal. -Okay, all right.
translation.zh: -真棒-好吧

translation.en: Who wants to go shoe shopping? Let's go.
translation.zh: 谁想去买鞋？我们走吧

translation.en: -What happened? -Oh, man, she's a breeder.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-伙计 她是个妈妈

translation.en: Two of them.
translation.zh: 两个孩子

translation.en: Hey, wait!
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -Oh, no. -Help!
translation.zh: -不-帮帮忙

translation.en: Do you have any jumper cables?
translation.zh: 你有电池急救线吗？

translation.en: No. No!
translation.zh: 不要走…

translation.en: Hey, Nick, don't do this.
translation.zh: 尼克 别这么做

translation.en: She's got two kids and a broken-down car.
translation.zh: 她有两个孩子和一辆坏掉的车

translation.en: What's next? You gonna ask her mama to move in with us?
translation.zh: 接下来呢？你要让她妈妈搬过来和我们一起住吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'm so happy to see you. I've been standing out here forever.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你我已经在这里站了很久了

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: This might not be a good idea, because we got rain, electricity.
translation.zh: 这可能不是个好主意因为下着雨 还有电

translation.en: Oh, but I sure do appreciate it.
translation.zh: 但我真的会很感激你

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You know, you look so familiar.
translation.zh: 你看起来很眼熟

translation.en: Have we met before?
translation.zh: 我们以前见过吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm Nick. I work right across the street from you.
translation.zh: 我是尼克 我就在你公司对面工作

translation.en: Oh, that's right. You're the guy that owns that cute little toy store.
translation.zh: 没错 你是那家可爱玩具店的老板

translation.en: Fine sports collectibles.
translation.zh: 体育收藏精品店

translation.en: Fine sports collectibles.
translation.zh: 体育收藏精品店

translation.en: I'll hook this up for you.
translation.zh: 我来给你把这个接上

translation.en: I think my car hates me.
translation.zh: 我觉得我的车讨厌我

translation.en: Oh, but, Nick, this is a nice ride.
translation.zh: 尼克 这辆车真棒

translation.en: -Oh, you like this, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你喜欢吗？-对

translation.en: You know, look. It even heats the undercarriage.
translation.zh: 看 它还有底盘加热功能

translation.en: I like it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: "I like it."
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: Remember the score: one player, two kids and--
translation.zh: 记住 一个女人 两个孩子还有…

translation.en: Holy moly!
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Oh, that is so cool. That's a Satchel Paige bobblehead.
translation.zh: 太酷了 萨奇佩吉的摇头娃娃

translation.en: That's when he played for the Monarchs.
translation.zh: 那是他在帝王队打球的时候的样子

translation.en: What? A woman that knows a little something about Satchel?
translation.zh: 什么？一个了解萨奇的女人？

translation.en: He was my daddy's idol. He pitched for five decades...
translation.zh: 他是我爸爸的偶像他当了50年投球手

translation.en: ...including three shutout innings for the Royals at the age of 59.
translation.zh: 59岁时还为皇家队打出三个完封局

translation.en: Well, you know, my man Satch used to have a saying:
translation.zh: 你知道 我的伙计萨奇以前常说

translation.en: "Age is a question of mind over matter.
translation.zh: “年龄只是在不在乎的问题

translation.en: If you don't mind, it don't matter."
translation.zh: 如果我不在乎 那就不是问题”

translation.en: You know that?
translation.zh: 你也知道这句话？

translation.en: This is Suzanne.
translation.zh: 我是苏珊妮

translation.en: Hubba-hubba. Now, that's a woman.
translation.zh: 天啊 真是个好女人

translation.en: Plenty of smarts, easy on the eyes, and can quote my stats.
translation.zh: 够聪明 又好看 还能引用我的名言

translation.en: I don't care if she got 100 kids. I like her.
translation.zh: 我不在乎她是不是有一百个孩子我喜欢她

translation.en: All we gotta do is lose the small fries.
translation.zh: 我们只需要甩掉那些拖油瓶就行

translation.en: Now, I'm not saying drop them in the shark tank. No.
translation.zh: 我不是说把他们扔进鲨鱼缸里 不

translation.en: But there's nothing kids like more than military school.
translation.zh: 但没有什么比军校更受孩子们喜欢了

translation.en: Out of sight, out of mind.
translation.zh: 眼不见心不烦

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: I don't mind.
translation.zh: 我不介意 如果你需要搭车我可以载你一程

translation.en: -If you need a lift, I'll give you a ride. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 我不介意 如果你需要搭车我可以载你一程 好

translation.en: Smooth, Nick. Here's how I think that we gonna make our move.
translation.zh: 不错 尼克 我觉得我们应该这样办

translation.en: Pretend like you gonna help her with her seat belt...
translation.zh: 首先 你凑过去假装要帮她系安全带

translation.en: ...then with your free hand, put your arm around her shoulder and-- Hey!
translation.zh: 然后用另一只手绕过她的肩膀然后…

translation.en: Let me out! How am I gonna wave you home if I can't see the play?
translation.zh: 放我出去 如果我看不到好戏我该怎么指导你达到目标？

translation.en: I'm a hall-of-famer. How about showing some respect?
translation.zh: 我是名人堂球员 能不能放尊重点？

translation.en: And that's my story.
translation.zh: 这就是我的故事

translation.en: What about you, Nick? Are you local?
translation.zh: 那你呢？尼克 你是本地人吗？

translation.en: -Black man from Oregon? -Right.
translation.zh: -俄勒冈的黑人？-对

translation.en: No. I'm from St. Louis.
translation.zh: 不 我是圣路易斯来的

translation.en: I actually moved out here to play Triple-A ball with the Beavers...
translation.zh: 我其实是搬到这里来为海狸职棒小联盟队打球的 但我的肩膀受伤了终结了我的职业生涯

translation.en: ...but ended up hurting my shoulder, and it kind of ended my career.
translation.zh: 但我的肩膀受伤了终结了我的职业生涯

translation.en: Oh, you threw your arm out pitching.
translation.zh: 你投球的时候伤到了肩膀

translation.en: Well, not exactly.
translation.zh: 其实不是

translation.en: I tore my rotator cuff lifting my big-screen TV out of a U-Haul.
translation.zh: 我从搬家货车里把我的大屏电视搬出来时造成了肩袖损伤

translation.en: -That's really sad. -I know.
translation.zh: -这真是个悲伤的故事-我知道

translation.en: Good thing there's athlete's insurance, in case you do something stupid.
translation.zh: 还好他们买了运动员保险以防你做蠢事

translation.en: So, you know, I was wondering...
translation.zh: 所以 我在想

translation.en: ...if maybe you'd consider-- If you wasn't busy--
translation.zh: 如果你不介意…如果你不忙…

translation.en: -What is going on out here? -Mom, where have you been?
translation.zh: -外面出什么事了？-妈妈 你去哪了？

translation.en: Miss Mable burned our dinner, fell asleep and just keeps farting.
translation.zh: 梅布尔小姐烧焦了我们的晚餐睡着之后一直在放屁

translation.en: Kevin and Lindsey, this is Mr. Persons. He was nice enough to give me a ride home.
translation.zh: 凯文和琳赛 这位是珀金斯先生他很好心地送我回家了

translation.en: What's he want, a reward?
translation.zh: 他想要什么？奖赏吗？

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 这样吧

translation.en: I really better get out of here.
translation.zh: 我真的得走了

translation.en: Smart.
translation.zh: 聪明

translation.en: Hey, Nick? I don't mean to be a pest...
translation.zh: 尼克？ 我不想麻烦你

translation.en: ...but I was just wondering if you could give me a ride to work tomorrow.
translation.zh: 但我想知道你明早能不能送我去上班

translation.en: -Of course. -Oh, great. Thank you.
translation.zh: -当然-太好了 谢谢你

translation.en: -See you tomorrow. -Bye.
translation.zh: -明天见-再见

translation.en: Mom, do you know what time it is?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你去哪了？你知道现在几点了吗？

translation.en: Excuse me, I'm the mother. Get in the house.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我是妈妈 进屋去

translation.en: -Get in the house. -It's raining.
translation.zh: -进屋去-下雨了

translation.en: -Get in the house. -Who is this stud, Nick?
translation.zh: -进屋去 快点-那个傻大个尼克是谁？ 你们真没礼貌 你们早该睡觉了

translation.en: You're supposed to be in bed.
translation.zh: 你们真没礼貌 你们早该睡觉了

translation.en: Nick, thank you so much for helping me these past couple days.
translation.zh: 尼克 非常感谢你这些天的帮忙

translation.en: -You are so sweet. -Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 你真好 我知道

translation.en: Hey, does this seem ripe to you?
translation.zh: 你觉得这个熟了吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I don't eat food unless it has an expiration date on it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只吃有保质期的食物

translation.en: Nick, you are funny. You eat worse than my 7-year-old son.
translation.zh: 尼克 你真逗你比我七岁的儿子吃得还烂

translation.en: You kind of dress like him too.
translation.zh: 你穿得跟他也有点像

translation.en: What's wrong with that?
translation.zh: 那有什么问题？

translation.en: And do you know I have never seen you without a hat?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我从没见过你摘帽子

translation.en: -You don't need to see me without it. -Let me see.
translation.zh: -你不需要看我摘帽子-拜托 尼克 让我看看

translation.en: -What's under there? -What?
translation.zh: -帽子下面有什么？-你在说什么？

translation.en: -Come on, Nick. -Watch out. Get back. Hold on.
translation.zh: -快点 尼克-当心点 姑娘 退后 别动

translation.en: -Get back. -Give me that.
translation.zh: -退后-把它给我

translation.en: Hang on. Don't move.
translation.zh: 等等 别动

translation.en: There.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -Nick, wait. -Right.
translation.zh: -尼克 等等-好

translation.en: -Wanna go to my apartment? -No, I can't. I can't.
translation.zh: -想去我家吗？-不 我不行

translation.en: I've thought about it. I really have. But let's be realistic. I'm a single mom.
translation.zh: 我想过 真的但我们现实点 我是个单亲妈妈

translation.en: No, you're a sexy mama.
translation.zh: 不 你是个性感的妈妈

translation.en: Do you know this whole time we've been hanging out...
translation.zh: 你知道我们在一起的这段时间

translation.en: ...you've never once asked me about my kids?
translation.zh: 你从来没有问过我的孩子们吗？

translation.en: -How they doing? -I bet you don't remember their names.
translation.zh: -他们怎么样？-我打赌你不记得他们的名字

translation.en: Rudy and Theo?
translation.zh: 鲁迪和西奥？

translation.en: Nick.
translation.zh: 尼克

translation.en: I think we should just be friends.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该当朋友

translation.en: Next point wins. Let's go.
translation.zh: 下一个得分的赢 来吧

translation.en: Hold on to your earrings there, Yao Bling...
translation.zh: 好吧 保护好你的耳环 闪亮的大个子

translation.en: ...because I'm gonna embarrass you. And it's gonna hurt because I love you.
translation.zh: 因为我会让你难堪的 到时候 你会很心痛 因为我像兄弟一样爱你

translation.en: -Give me that. -Hey, that's a foul.
translation.zh: -给我-犯规 你打我手了

translation.en: -Come on, man, you hit my hand. -No, I didn't.
translation.zh: -拜托 伙计 你打到我手了-不 我没有

translation.en: Right here, baby. Right here.
translation.zh: 就是这样 宝贝 就是这样

translation.en: Game time.
translation.zh: 游戏时间到

translation.en: Yeah, baby. Yeah. Bye-bye. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 对 宝贝 没错 再见

translation.en: Get off of me, Lurch. That was a moving pick.
translation.zh: 离我远点 卢尔西 那是行进间犯规

translation.en: Let's run it again. Same teams. Come on.
translation.zh: 快点 我们再来一次队伍不变 快点

translation.en: No. I gotta go, y'all.
translation.zh: -不 我该走了 伙计们-你该走了是什么意思？

translation.en: What? We're tied. Somebody has to lose.
translation.zh: -不 我该走了 伙计们-你该走了是什么意思？ 我们平手 必须有人要输这是美国的方式

translation.en: -It's the American way. -Hey, somebody did lose.
translation.zh: 我们平手 必须有人要输这是美国的方式 已经有人输了 你知道我有事

translation.en: -You know I gotta go do that thing. -What thing? What?
translation.zh: 已经有人输了 你知道我有事 什么事？什么？

translation.en: You know, I gotta take Suzanne to the airport in the morning.
translation.zh: 你知道我早上要送苏珊妮去机场

translation.en: Take Suzanne to the airport in the morning.
translation.zh: 早上送苏珊妮去机场

translation.en: -You are stuck in the friend zone. -Get out of here.
translation.zh: -你被困在朋友区里了-滚开

translation.en: Listen to me. We've been friends a very long time...
translation.zh: 听着 听我说 请听我说 我们已经做朋友非常久了

translation.en: ...and I am telling you, you gotta dump this girl.
translation.zh: 我要告诉你 你得把这姑娘甩了

translation.en: -What? We not even going out. -That's the point, Nick.
translation.zh: 甩了她是什么意思？我们都没在约会 这就是重点 尼克

translation.en: Whatever it is you don't have going on, it has got to end.
translation.zh: 不管你们还没有的是什么都应该结束了

translation.en: Okay, for all those who listen to this clown...
translation.zh: 所有在听这个小丑说话的人都听着

translation.en: ...Nick Persons will never be in the friend zone.
translation.zh: 尼克珀金斯永远不会待在朋友区

translation.en: -Understand that and believe that. -Friend zone. Friend zone.
translation.zh: -理解并相信这句话-朋友区…

translation.en: -Don't say I didn't warn you. -Friend zone.
translation.zh: -别说我没警告过你-朋友区

translation.en: -Here you go. -Oh, Nick, thank you so much.
translation.zh: -给你-尼克 非常感谢

translation.en: You are such a great friend.
translation.zh: 你真是个好朋友

translation.en: The friend zone is for losers only.
translation.zh: 朋友区是为失败者准备的

translation.en: Please unload your friend and get on with your life.
translation.zh: 请丢掉你的朋友 继续你的生活

translation.en: -Well, wish me luck. -Good luck.
translation.zh: -祝我好运吧-祝你好运

translation.en: Thanks for everything, Nick.
translation.zh: 太感谢你了 尼克

translation.en: Suzanne, can I talk to you real quick?
translation.zh: 苏珊妮 我能跟你说两句话吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: -当然-你知道 我们之间的关系…

translation.en: You know, what we got going-- I mean, we don't really have something--
translation.zh: -当然-你知道 我们之间的关系… 我是说 我们其实没有真的…

translation.en: I don't really know what to call this...
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么称呼它

translation.en: -Hang on. -...but it seems kind of.... This is Suzanne.
translation.zh: -但这看起来有点…-等等 我是苏珊妮

translation.en: Yes, Frank.
translation.zh: 对 弗兰克

translation.en: Just one sec.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Well, when did that happen?
translation.zh: 那是什么时候的事？

translation.en: Well, actually, I'm already at the airport.
translation.zh: 其实我已经在机场了

translation.en: -Hey. You can't park here. -I know.
translation.zh: -你不能在这停车-我知道

translation.en: My friend's making a call. She'll be off in a second.
translation.zh: 但我朋友在打电话她马上就打完了

translation.en: -Gonna be an expensive call. -I'm right here.
translation.zh: -这通电话会很贵-但我就站在这呢

translation.en: That's why you're getting a ticket.
translation.zh: 对 所以你会得到一张罚单

translation.en: They're expecting to spend New Year's Eve with you.
translation.zh: 他们很期待和你一起过新年夜

translation.en: Oh, don't-- Don't even go there with me, Frank.
translation.zh: 别…别跟我说这些 弗兰克

translation.en: You haven't spent five minutes with your kids since Labor Day.
translation.zh: 劳动节之后你就没陪过你的孩子们

translation.en: Frank, you know what? I am so sick of this.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 你知道吗？我受够了

translation.en: I-- Hello? Hello?
translation.zh: 我…喂…

translation.en: Know what? That lady's got enough problems.
translation.zh: 这样吧 那位女士的麻烦已经够多了

translation.en: All right, let's move it along.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧

translation.en: -I'm not going. -What's the matter?
translation.zh: -我不去了-怎么了？

translation.en: My ex is sick, and he's not gonna pick up the kids.
translation.zh: 我前夫病了 他不能接孩子了

translation.en: -What about the babysitter? -She's leaving for Las Vegas...
translation.zh: 那保姆呢？ 梅布尔小姐要和她教堂的组员一起去拉斯维加斯

translation.en: -...with her church group. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: 梅布尔小姐要和她教堂的组员一起去拉斯维加斯 不是吧

translation.en: You know, my kids miss him so much...
translation.zh: 你知道 我的孩子们很想他

translation.en: ...and all he ever does is pull the rug out right from under them.
translation.zh: 但他永远只会让他们失望

translation.en: I'm gonna lose my job.
translation.zh: 我会丢掉工作的

translation.en: What if I bring them?
translation.zh: 如果我送他们去呢？

translation.en: I couldn't ask you to do that. That's too much.
translation.zh: 拜托 尼克 我不能让你那么做这个忙太大了

translation.en: Why not? Look, it's no big deal. Serious.
translation.zh: 为什么不？听着 这没什么 真的

translation.en: -Really? -Positive.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-当然

translation.en: -Are you sure? -I wanna help you on this.
translation.zh: -你确定吗？-我想帮你这个忙

translation.en: Nick, this is huge.
translation.zh: 尼克 这个忙太大了

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 太感谢你了

translation.en: You are a lifesaver.
translation.zh: 你救了我的命

translation.en: Okay, so I'll get the three tickets, and as soon as you guys land, call me.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会买三张票 你们一下飞机就给我打电话

translation.en: Oh, no, I meant that I'll drop them off at the airport.
translation.zh: 不 我的意思是我送他们去机场

translation.en: Oh, no. You can't expect the kids to travel alone, Nick.
translation.zh: 不 你不能让孩子们单独坐飞机 尼克

translation.en: Kevin's got asthma. That recycled air in the plane-- I mean, yuck.
translation.zh: 凯文有哮喘机舱里的循环空气太脏了

translation.en: But it'd be fine. Kids fly all the time.
translation.zh: 但没事的 孩子们经常坐飞机不会有事的

translation.en: It's nothing. I'll make sure they get on the plane.
translation.zh: 但没事的 孩子们经常坐飞机不会有事的 我会确保他们坐上飞机他们会得到牛奶和饼干

translation.en: They'll get milk and cookies, little plastic wings, get to meet the pilot.
translation.zh: 我会确保他们坐上飞机他们会得到牛奶和饼干 小塑料翅膀 有机会见到飞行员

translation.en: You know, it'd be real cool.
translation.zh: 你知道 这会很酷的

translation.en: Especially with me sitting next to them making sure everything is all right.
translation.zh: 尤其是有我坐在他们身边 确保一切正常

translation.en: Oh, how could I ever repay you?
translation.zh: 我该怎么报答你？

translation.en: Obviously, you don't care that she's using you.
translation.zh: 显然你不在乎她利用你

translation.en: But ask yourself this:
translation.zh: 但问问你自己

translation.en: Would you trust a woman who'd trust you with her kids?
translation.zh: 你会信任一个把她的孩子托付给你的女人吗？

translation.en: I'm tempted to call Child Services right now.
translation.zh: 我现在就想给儿童保护服务局打电话

translation.en: Uncle Nick loves kids.
translation.zh: 尼克叔叔喜欢小孩

translation.en: Big lummox. Might as well just put myself on eBay.
translation.zh: 大傻瓜 还是把我放到网上卖了吧

translation.en: Hello. I'm here to pick up the kids.
translation.zh: 你好 我是来接孩子们的

translation.en: Now, that's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 我想说的就是这件事

translation.en: What you wasting your time with Miss Suzanne for?
translation.zh: 你为什么要在苏珊妮小姐身上浪费时间？

translation.en: -Excuse me? -You come with me.
translation.zh: -你说什么？-你跟我来

translation.en: Miss Mable will take you on a guided tour to Sin City.
translation.zh: 梅布尔小姐可以带你去罪恶之城

translation.en: Oh, God. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 天啊 不好意思

translation.en: Hello? Somebody?
translation.zh: 你好？有人吗？

translation.en: Who wants to go to Vancouver?
translation.zh: 谁想去温哥华？

translation.en: Mom says that we should be polite.
translation.zh: 妈妈说我们应该有礼貌

translation.en: Now, kids, I know you're disappointed about your father...
translation.zh: 孩子们 我知道你们对爸爸很失望

translation.en: ...but you're going to have fun.
translation.zh: 但你们会很开心的

translation.en: Aren't you?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: -Yes, Miss Mable. -Yes, Miss Mable.
translation.zh: 是 梅布尔小姐…

translation.en: Hey, did you bring us a gift?
translation.zh: 你给我们带礼物了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, Mom's man friends always bring us presents.
translation.zh: 对 妈妈的男性朋友总是给我们带礼物

translation.en: Oh, of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: What kind of guy you think I am? Uncle Nick loves kids.
translation.zh: 你们觉得我是什么人？尼克叔叔喜欢小孩

translation.en: As a matter of fact.... Look, look, look.
translation.zh: 其实…看…

translation.en: Dr. Munchies pizza coupon.
translation.zh: 贪吃博士的比萨优惠券

translation.en: You get a free liter of soda with any purchase of a large pepperoni.
translation.zh: 买大号意大利香肠比萨就能得到一升免费的汽水

translation.en: -What's a liter? -Oh, yeah, and for you....
translation.zh: -升是什么？-对 还有你…

translation.en: -Look at that. Corkscrew. -Cool.
translation.zh: -看 开瓶器-酷

translation.en: -Hey, it's got a knife. -You can't give him that.
translation.zh: -那上面有刀-你不能给他那个

translation.en: -Shut up. -Make me.
translation.zh: -闭嘴-逼我啊

translation.en: I don't make trash. I bury it.
translation.zh: 我不会逼垃圾 我会把它埋掉

translation.en: -Well, I'll bury my foot in your-- -Say it. You're too scared to say it.
translation.zh: -我要把我的手指埋在你的…-说啊 你不敢说

translation.en: Be quiet, you paranoid dunce.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 你这个偏执狂

translation.en: -Chicken. -Stop it. Stop it.
translation.zh: -胆小鬼-停 别说了

translation.en: Hey, wanna learn some Chinese?
translation.zh: 想学点中文吗？

translation.en: Sure. What you got?
translation.zh: 当然 你会说什么？

translation.en: Sensei says, "The first one is always a decoy."
translation.zh: 先生说“第一招总是虚招”

translation.en: Shotgun!
translation.zh: 出发

translation.en: That's my seat. You stop.
translation.zh: 那是我的座位 你别去

translation.en: They gonna eat you alive.
translation.zh: 他们会把你生吞的

translation.en: -You're too ugly to sit in the front seat. -That's my seat.
translation.zh: 你太丑了 不能坐在前排 那是我的座位

translation.en: Hey! Watch the paint.
translation.zh: 当心车漆

translation.en: Okay, now, once we get in this terminal... ...I want everybody sticking together.
translation.zh: 好吧 一旦我们进了候机楼我希望大家都待在一起

translation.en: Now, be careful opening that door.
translation.zh: 现在 开门的时候小心点

translation.en: Man! What did--?
translation.zh: 天啊 这是怎么…

translation.en: -Sorry, Nick. -Oh, damn!
translation.zh: -抱歉 尼克-该死

translation.en: -Boy, didn't you hear what I just said? -You swore.
translation.zh: -孩子 你没听到我刚才的话吗？-你说脏话了

translation.en: You damn right I swore. That's about $400 worth of damage to my new car.
translation.zh: 我确实说脏话了 我的新车受到了价值四百块的损坏

translation.en: That's twice. Now you have to put $2 in the swear jar.
translation.zh: 说了两次 你要往脏话罐里放两块钱

translation.en: Yeah, well, he gotta put about $400 in my pocket.
translation.zh: 没错 他要往我口袋里放四百块

translation.en: -You got $400 for me? -No.
translation.zh: -你有四百块吗？-没有

translation.en: And I want it cash.
translation.zh: 而且我要现金

translation.en: Okay, man, no tears, all right?
translation.zh: 好吧 伙计 别哭 好吗？

translation.en: I won't change diapers out here.
translation.zh: 我不想在这换尿布

translation.en: Real good. Have you ever thought of being a youth pastor or a therapist?
translation.zh: 说得真好 你有没有考虑过去当青年牧师或者心理医生？

translation.en: Look, it ain't like I said I was gonna take off my belt.
translation.zh: 听着 我可没说我要把腰带摘下来

translation.en: He's gonna beat me, Lindsey! Save me!
translation.zh: 他要打我了 琳赛 救我

translation.en: -Hey. Hey, man. -Don't touch me!
translation.zh: -伙计-别碰我

translation.en: -Little dude. Kevin. Come here. -Get away!
translation.zh: -小兄弟 凯文 过来-走开

translation.en: Is there a problem here, sir?
translation.zh: 有什么问题吗？先生

translation.en: Just a little game I'm playing with the kids.
translation.zh: 我只是在跟孩子们玩一个小游戏

translation.en: Boy, bring your butt back here!
translation.zh: 孩子 快到这里来

translation.en: Kevin. Boy. Look.
translation.zh: 凯文 孩子 听着

translation.en: Yo, yo, yo. Hey, hey. Look, look.
translation.zh: 听着…

translation.en: Look, I got money. Check it out.
translation.zh: 看 我有钱 看看

translation.en: Will that shut you up, huh?
translation.zh: 这能让你闭嘴了吗？

translation.en: Here you go. Ten bucks. Come on.
translation.zh: 给你 十块钱 过来

translation.en: Yeah. That's right.
translation.zh: 对 这就对了

translation.en: Hey, you can't buy us off. Apologize.
translation.zh: 你不能收买我们 快道歉

translation.en: No, no. We're cool.
translation.zh: 不…我们没事

translation.en: Yeah. We cool, little mama.
translation.zh: 对 我们没事 小妈妈

translation.en: Plus, there's enough to go around. Got a ten-spot for you too.
translation.zh: 再说 还有商量的余地我也给你准备了十块钱

translation.en: I do believe I'm older than him.
translation.zh: 我相信我比他大

translation.en: I can't believe I'm getting hustled by a couple of gangsters. Here.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我被两个小混混打劫了 给

translation.en: Now, hurry up. We can't be late.
translation.zh: 现在快点 我们不能迟到

translation.en: When we go through, they can see our bones and innards?
translation.zh: 我们过去的时候他们能看到我们的骨头和内脏吗？

translation.en: -No, fool, that's an x-ray. -Wrong answer.
translation.zh: -不 傻瓜 那是X光机-回答错误

translation.en: It's a metal detector.
translation.zh: 那是金属探测器

translation.en: Oh, to see if you have any bombs?
translation.zh: 是为了看你有没有藏炸弹吗？

translation.en: You're not allowed to say "bombs" here.
translation.zh: 你不能在这里说“炸弹”这个词

translation.en: -Why can't you say "bomb"? -Please remove all metal objects.
translation.zh: 为什么不能说“炸弹”这个词？ 请把所有金属物品都取出来钥匙 硬币 手机 首饰

translation.en: Keys, loose change, cell phones, jewelry.
translation.zh: 请把所有金属物品都取出来钥匙 硬币 手机 首饰

translation.en: Okay. Just might take a minute.
translation.zh: 好吧 只是需要点时间

translation.en: I hope you left Nick's little present in the car, or else you're going to jail.
translation.zh: 我希望你把尼克的小礼物放在车里了否则你会进监狱的

translation.en: Cell phone.
translation.zh: 手机

translation.en: Car keys.
translation.zh: 车钥匙

translation.en: Excuse me. Sir?
translation.zh: 抱歉 先生？

translation.en: What? What?
translation.zh: 什么？怎么了？

translation.en: Sir, can you step to the red line, please?
translation.zh: 先生 能请您站到红线这边来吗？

translation.en: I put everything on the tray.
translation.zh: 我把所有东西都放进托盘里了

translation.en: Please raise your arms and separate your legs.
translation.zh: 请举起双手 双腿分开

translation.en: Corkscrew!
translation.zh: 开瓶器

translation.en: Let's just get out of here before I end up in Guantánamo Bay.
translation.zh: 趁我还没被关进关塔那摩监狱我们赶紧离开这

translation.en: Our dad would've never given him a knife.
translation.zh: 我们的爸爸不会给他刀的

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm not your dad. -That's for sure.
translation.zh: -对 我不是你们的爸爸-那当然

translation.en: All right, let's go. Pick it up.
translation.zh: 好吧 走吧 把它拿起来

translation.en: It's actually gonna work out better because trains are more fun.
translation.zh: 其实情况会好起来的因为坐火车更有意思

translation.en: -Do you got any snacks? -You mean candy?
translation.zh: -你有零食吗？-你是指糖果吗？

translation.en: -No way. -I have to pee.
translation.zh: -不可能-我想尿尿

translation.en: Can't you wait till we get on the train? It's right there.
translation.zh: 你不能等到我们上火车吗？它就在那

translation.en: -I don't think I can wait that long. -Yes, you can. Come on.
translation.zh: -我觉得我忍不了那么久-你可以的 快点

translation.en: He's prone to bladder infections, you know.
translation.zh: 他容易膀胱感染 你知道的

translation.en: All right, man, go do your business.
translation.zh: 好吧 伙计 去上你的厕所

translation.en: Aren't you coming in with me?
translation.zh: 你不跟我一起去吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but I'm not touching nothing.
translation.zh: 好 但我什么都不会碰

translation.en: All aboard!
translation.zh: 都上车

translation.en: -Come on, come on. -I'm coming.
translation.zh: -快点…-我来了

translation.en: Wait. My shoe's untied.
translation.zh: 等等 我的鞋带松了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: All clear.
translation.zh: 检查完毕

translation.en: Come on, Kevin. Hurry up.
translation.zh: 快点 凯文 快点

translation.en: Over....
translation.zh: 过来…

translation.en: Loop. Other loop.
translation.zh: 一圈 另外一圈

translation.en: You know what? Let me do it. Let me do it. Let me do it.
translation.zh: 这样吧 让我来…

translation.en: No! Pull from the first loop.
translation.zh: 不 你应该从第一圈拉

translation.en: -Otherwise it's too tight at the top. -Okay, okay.
translation.zh: -否则上面就太紧了-好吧…

translation.en: The boy has problems. He won't eat anything orange, steamed or poached.
translation.zh: 这孩子有毛病 他不吃橙色的清蒸和水煮的任何东西

translation.en: And what he does eat, they can't touch.
translation.zh: 他吃的东西不能被人碰过

translation.en: -Okay, there you go. -No. Do it again.
translation.zh: -好吧 好了-不 重新系

translation.en: That doesn't feel right.
translation.zh: 感觉不对劲

translation.en: His socks can't have elastic in them.
translation.zh: 他的袜子里不能有松紧带

translation.en: And he won't use a toothbrush more than five days.
translation.zh: 他也不会用一支牙刷超过五天

translation.en: -Shut up! -Make me.
translation.zh: -闭嘴-你逼我啊

translation.en: Who'd wanna make another one--?
translation.zh: 谁想逼别人？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Hold on, hold on. Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.zh: 等等…

translation.en: Hey. Where's Galaktico's cape?
translation.zh: 银河巨星的披风去哪了？

translation.en: Kevin.
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: Final boarding call for Vancouver passengers...
translation.zh: 最后一次广播 前往温哥华的乘客

translation.en: ...departing from track two.
translation.zh: 请在二号站台上车

translation.en: Look, it's damp.
translation.zh: 看 它都湿了

translation.en: Kevin! Lindsey!
translation.zh: 凯文 琳赛

translation.en: Hey! Hey! Kevin! Lindsey!
translation.zh: 凯文 琳赛

translation.en: Hey. The train's moving.
translation.zh: 火车在动

translation.en: Out my way.
translation.zh: 快让开

translation.en: Hey! Crazy kids. Yo!
translation.zh: 疯狂的小孩

translation.en: Hey! Hey, come on!
translation.zh: 快来…

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Sorry, lady.
translation.zh: 抱歉 夫人

translation.en: -Hey! -What's he doing?
translation.zh: 他在干什么？

translation.en: I think he wants us to jump onto a moving train.
translation.zh: 我觉得他想让我们跳上开着的火车

translation.en: Hey! Kevin! Lindsey! Hey! Get up here! Come on!
translation.zh: 凯文 琳赛 过来 快点

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing? Run!
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？快跑

translation.en: Are you crazy? Jump!
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？跳下来

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Mama.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: -Hey, Nick, how's the train ride going? -Well, we haven't exactly left yet.
translation.zh: -你好 尼克 火车之旅怎么样？-其实我们还没走

translation.en: We decided to drive. It should be much more educational.
translation.zh: 我们决定开车去 这样会更有教育意义

translation.en: Oh, no, Nick, I cannot let you do that. That's way too much trouble.
translation.zh: 不 尼克 我不能让你这么做那样太麻烦了

translation.en: No, no. It'll only take a few more hours...
translation.zh: 不…只需要多花几个小时

translation.en: ...and gives me a chance to get to know Kevin and Lindsey.
translation.zh: 还能给我个机会了解凯文和琳赛

translation.en: Okay. I'm really impressed.
translation.zh: 好吧 我真的很感动

translation.en: -You're very sweet. -Yes, I am.
translation.zh: -你真贴心-对 没错

translation.en: You sound like you have everything under control. Can I talk to the kids?
translation.zh: 听起来一切都在你掌握之中我能跟孩子们说两句吗？

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Look, don't tell them nothing that happened, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 别告诉她出了什么事 好吗？

translation.en: -He lost our luggage. -What?
translation.zh: -他把我们的行李弄丢了-什么？

translation.en: -Are you guys dating? -No.
translation.zh: -你俩在约会吗？-没有

translation.en: -No. -Let me talk.
translation.zh: -没有-让我说话

translation.en: We wanna go to Dad's.
translation.zh: 我们想去爸爸家

translation.en: You cannot go to Dad's now. You're going with Nick.
translation.zh: 你们现在不能去爸爸家你们要跟着尼克

translation.en: Why? Dad's house is in the same direction.
translation.zh: 为什么？爸爸家也在这个方向

translation.en: Nick could drop us off there on his way not to date you.
translation.zh: 尼克可以在不去跟你约会的路上把我们放下

translation.en: Honey, your dad is sick and in bed.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你爸爸生病卧床了

translation.en: Now, if you want me to...
translation.zh: 如果你想的话

translation.en: ...I can just quit my job, and we'll go live in a cardboard box.
translation.zh: 我可以辞掉工作然后我们就住到纸壳箱里去

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便吧

translation.en: -Let him drive. -Be nice.
translation.zh: -让他开车吧-乖一点

translation.en: -I love you. -Love you too.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我也爱你

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Now, look, driving you two gremlins on New Year's Eve...
translation.zh: 听着 带你们两个小鬼在除夕夜

translation.en: ...for over 300 miles was never on the agenda. Okay?
translation.zh: 开300哩不在我计划内 好吗？

translation.en: We just drove across town, and y'all done messed up my door.
translation.zh: 我们在城里开了一趟你们就把我的车门弄坏了

translation.en: So now I got to lay down some rules.
translation.zh: 现在我要定几条规矩

translation.en: Rule number--
translation.zh: 规矩…

translation.en: Rule number one: Don't touch the climate control.
translation.zh: 规矩一 不要碰空调控制系统

translation.en: Rule number two: Don't kick the seat.
translation.zh: 规矩二 不要踢座位

translation.en: Rule number three: Don't play with toys.
translation.zh: 规矩三 不要玩玩具

translation.en: -Can I play with my pizza coupon? -No sassing me.
translation.zh: -我能玩比萨优惠券吗？-别顶嘴

translation.en: No eating in the car, no drinking in the car and no smoking.
translation.zh: 不能在车里吃东西 喝东西或者抽烟

translation.en: -I don't smoke. -Good.
translation.zh: -我不抽烟-很好

translation.en: Don't start on my watch.
translation.zh: 别在我看管下开始抽

translation.en: I don't want you to touch the radio.
translation.zh: 我不想让你们碰收音机

translation.en: I don't even want you to sniff the new-car smell.
translation.zh: 我甚至不想让你们闻新车的味道

translation.en: I want you to sit down on that protective plastic...
translation.zh: 我想让你们坐在塑料保护膜上

translation.en: ...and be seen, not heard.
translation.zh: 安静地待着 别出声 懂了吗？

translation.en: You know, if you're thinking about my mom, you're wasting your time.
translation.zh: 如果你想打我妈的主意那你就是在浪费时间

translation.en: I'm not wasting my time, because me and your mom, we're just friends.
translation.zh: 我不是在浪费时间 因为我和你妈妈 我们只是朋友

translation.en: That's good, because Mom's still into Dad, and he's totally into her.
translation.zh: 那就好 因为妈妈还喜欢爸爸而且他也很喜欢她

translation.en: They're getting back together.
translation.zh: 而且他们会复合的 很快就会

translation.en: Whoopee! I'm happy for them.
translation.zh: 我为他们高兴

translation.en: Or maybe you guys should go out.
translation.zh: 或者也许你们应该出去约会

translation.en: Couple of dates with you would really make her appreciate Dad.
translation.zh: 跟你约几次会她就更觉得爸爸好了

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: Have a taste of my steel, zombie.
translation.zh: 吃我一刀 僵尸

translation.en: -Yes! -That game doesn't sound G-rated.
translation.zh: -好-那个游戏听起来少儿不宜

translation.en: Yeah, but it's keeping him occupied.
translation.zh: 对 但听起来那让他很专注

translation.en: The boy played Lady Pac-Man at the mall and had nightmares for a week.
translation.zh: 那孩子在商场里玩吃豆人都会做一星期噩梦

translation.en: -Give it here, Kevin. -Hey, give it!
translation.zh: -把它给我 凯文-松手

translation.en: -Give it to me. What did I say? -It's not yours!
translation.zh: -凯文 把它给我 我说什么了？-这不是你的

translation.en: -Give it here now! -You're not the boss of me!
translation.zh: -快把它给我-你又不是我的老大

translation.en: Cut it out.
translation.zh: 放开它

translation.en: Why don't we call Mom and see what she has to say.
translation.zh: 否则我们就给妈妈打电话看她会怎么说

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You win.
translation.zh: 你赢了

translation.en: Snitch.
translation.zh: 打小报告

translation.en: Baby.
translation.zh: 小婴儿

translation.en: -Big baby. -Bigger baby.
translation.zh: -大婴儿-更大的婴儿

translation.en: -Giant baby. -Enormous baby.
translation.zh: -巨婴-庞然大婴

translation.en: -Humongous baby. -Colossal baby.
translation.zh: -超级大婴-超巨大婴

translation.en: -Am not. Am not. -Are too. Are too.
translation.zh: -我不是…-你就是…

translation.en: -Am not. Am not. -Are too.
translation.zh: -我不是…-你就是

translation.en: Okay, okay.
translation.zh: 好了…

translation.en: You're both acting like a couple of babies.
translation.zh: 你俩都像婴儿一样

translation.en: Keep it moving. Come on.
translation.zh: 继续开车 快点

translation.en: That's right. Drink your juice, baby.
translation.zh: 没错 喝你的果汁吧 小婴儿

translation.en: -Hey, no food in the car. -It's not food. It's juice.
translation.zh: -车里不能吃东西-这不是吃的 这是果汁

translation.en: -Same difference. Give it. -Mine.
translation.zh: -都一样 给我-是我的

translation.en: Man, see?
translation.zh: 伙计 看到了吧？

translation.en: Oh, y'all think that's funny, don't you?
translation.zh: 你们觉得这很好玩 是吗？

translation.en: It's not funny.
translation.zh: 一点都不好玩

translation.en: One thing you gotta know here, we keep it real.
translation.zh: 不 你们得知道一件事我是认真的

translation.en: You can believe that.
translation.zh: 你们得相信 （光盘）

translation.en: Yuck! Noisy.
translation.zh: 难听 真吵

translation.en: -What is that? -50 Cent.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-50美分

translation.en: Well, I'll pay him a dollar just to shut up.
translation.zh: 我愿意给他一元让他闭嘴

translation.en: Do you have any Justin Timberlake or Clay Aiken?
translation.zh: 你有贾斯汀汀布莱克或者克雷艾肯的歌吗？

translation.en: Lord, these kids are ethnically challenged.
translation.zh: 天啊 这些孩子真是背叛种族

translation.en: Do you know you can get shot...
translation.zh: 你们知道在我原来住的街区

translation.en: ...by playing those CDs in my old neighborhood?
translation.zh: 播放那种光盘是要被枪杀的吗？

translation.en: -We're not ghetto. -Or trying to be ghetto fabulous.
translation.zh: -我们不是贫民窟的人-或者想成为贫民窟中的传奇人物

translation.en: We're just fabulous.
translation.zh: 我们就是传奇

translation.en: About time. Open road.
translation.zh: 时间到了 一路畅通

translation.en: Vancouver, here we come.
translation.zh: 温哥华 我们来了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: I have to pee.
translation.zh: 我要尿尿

translation.en: What? No, no, you do not have to pee.
translation.zh: 什么？不…你不用尿尿

translation.en: Didn't you go at the train station?
translation.zh: 你在火车站不是尿过了吗？

translation.en: I tried to go, but there was a man standing next to me...
translation.zh: 我想尿来着 但有个男人站在我旁边

translation.en: ...so it just went away.
translation.zh: 我的尿意就没了

translation.en: But look, man, all this open road.
translation.zh: 听着 伙计 这是高速公路

translation.en: You can hold it. I know you can. Cross your legs.
translation.zh: 你能忍住的 我知道你可以把腿夹住

translation.en: -You should've asked before we left. -I did.
translation.zh: 我们走之前你应该问问的 我问了

translation.en: No, you asked before we got on the train, not before we left the station.
translation.zh: 不 你在我们上火车之前问了但在离开车站前没问

translation.en: You're supposed to ask before every segment.
translation.zh: 每次行动之前你应该都问的

translation.en: -Everyone knows that. -Evidently not.
translation.zh: -大家都知道-显然不是

translation.en: I'm not gonna make it. Do you have a bottle?
translation.zh: 我忍不住了 你有瓶子吗？

translation.en: -No. -How about this ashtray?
translation.zh: -没有-那这个烟灰缸呢？

translation.en: Kevin, there's no receptacle in this vehicle.
translation.zh: 凯文 这辆车里没有容器

translation.en: Now, look, the exit is about a mile away, and you can hold it.
translation.zh: 听着 出口只有不到1.6公里你能忍住的

translation.en: How far is a mile?
translation.zh: 1.6公里是多远？

translation.en: I don't know, 5000 and some kind of feet.
translation.zh: 我不知道 1500米之类的吧

translation.en: Look, think of something else. Football, a math test...
translation.zh: 听着 想点别的 足球 数学考试

translation.en: ...puberty.
translation.zh: 青春期

translation.en: -Are we there yet? -No.
translation.zh: -我们到了吗？-还没

translation.en: I'm sure the carpet is absorbent.
translation.zh: -我们到了吗？-还没 我相信地毯能吸水

translation.en: Oh, here it comes!
translation.zh: 要出来了

translation.en: For God's sakes, man, he's gonna make his water in your car!
translation.zh: 看在上帝的份上 伙计他要在你车里尿尿了

translation.en: No, he ain't.
translation.zh: 不 他不会的

translation.en: Incoming! Incoming! Incoming!
translation.zh: 来了…

translation.en: Hold it, man.
translation.zh: 忍住 伙计 （冰）

translation.en: -Hold it. Oh, no. Look, right here. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -忍住 不 看 就在这-好

translation.en: Here we go. Here we go.
translation.zh: 我们走…

translation.en: In here, in here. Hold it, hold it.
translation.zh: 这里…忍住…

translation.en: -This is taken! -I'm sorry!
translation.zh: -有人了-抱歉

translation.en: -Oh, it's dribbling out. -Okay, go, go. Just go.
translation.zh: -要滴出来了-好吧 尿吧

translation.en: -That's disgusting! -Hey, wait a minute.
translation.zh: 太恶心了 等一下 等等 夫人 别打我

translation.en: Wait a minute, lady. Hold up.
translation.zh: 等一下 等等 夫人 别打我

translation.en: Bought us some groceries for later.
translation.zh: 给我们买了点路上吃的东西

translation.en: Your mama said you liked fruit.
translation.zh: 你妈妈说你喜欢水果

translation.en: -Garlic olives? -Hey, it's a truck stop.
translation.zh: -大蒜橄榄？-这是个卡车停靠站

translation.en: That's all they had.
translation.zh: 他们只有这个

translation.en: You see this?
translation.zh: 你看到这个了吗？

translation.en: Because of you guys, I gotta do this right here.
translation.zh: 这都是因为你们 我得把它擦掉

translation.en: You squeezed it, not me.
translation.zh: 是你挤出来的 不是我

translation.en: It's not coming out.
translation.zh: 擦不下来

translation.en: Hit that green button for me, please.
translation.zh: 帮我单击绿色的按钮

translation.en: -Yo, yo, yo. -Hey. Hey, it's Marty. What's up, man?
translation.zh: -喂…-喂…我是马蒂 你怎么样？伙计

translation.en: How's it going with those stupid brats you got with you?
translation.zh: 你跟那两个愚蠢的小混蛋处得如何？

translation.en: Remember this: If the kids hate you, the mama won't date you.
translation.zh: 记住 如果孩子讨厌你妈妈就不会跟你约会

translation.en: -Man! -Where'd you go?
translation.zh: -天啊-你去哪了？

translation.en: What, are you in a tunnel?
translation.zh: 怎么？你在隧道里吗？

translation.en: Are you--? Hello?
translation.zh: 你是不是…喂？

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 好吧 好了

translation.en: Seat belts.
translation.zh: 把安全带系上

translation.en: Nobody gotta go to the bathroom, right?
translation.zh: 没人想去厕所了吧？

translation.en: Okay, here we go.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们走

translation.en: Nick, we already know about you and Mom.
translation.zh: 尼克 我们已经知道你和妈妈的事了

translation.en: -You do? -Of course.
translation.zh: -是吗？-当然

translation.en: -She talks about you all the time. -Yeah, Mom's into you.
translation.zh: -她一直在说你的事-对 妈妈喜欢你

translation.en: She says you're better looking than Taye Diggs.
translation.zh: 她说你比泰依迪格斯还帅

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -I am, huh? -Oh, sure.
translation.zh: -我更帅 是吗？-当然

translation.en: In fact, she told me--
translation.zh: 其实 她跟我说…

translation.en: My gosh. Get his inhaler. He's having an asthma attack.
translation.zh: 我的天 把他的吸入器拿来他的哮喘犯了

translation.en: -What? Where is it? -It's in the back. Hurry up!
translation.zh: -什么？它在哪？-在后面 快点

translation.en: -Go! Go! -All right, I'm going.
translation.zh: -快去-好吧 我这就去

translation.en: -I got it. I got it. -Move it!
translation.zh: -我去拿-快去

translation.en: Good one, Lindsey.
translation.zh: 干得好 琳赛

translation.en: Very funny.
translation.zh: 真有趣

translation.en: -Open up. -I knew you were lying.
translation.zh: -开门-我知道你在说谎

translation.en: "We're just friends." You're just using us to suck up to our mama.
translation.zh: “对 我们只是朋友”对 没错 你只是在利用我们接近我们的妈妈

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -什么？-对

translation.en: You're just a dirty, horny sex man like all the others. Nasty man.
translation.zh: 你跟其他人一样是肮脏的臭男人 流氓 你是个臭流氓

translation.en: -You're a nasty, bad man. -Look...
translation.zh: 流氓 你是个臭流氓

translation.en: ...I tried to do your mama a favor, you booger.
translation.zh: 听着 我只是想帮你们妈妈的忙你这个小混蛋

translation.en: You probably wanna kiss her, don't you?
translation.zh: 你可能想亲她 不是吗？

translation.en: Look, look. Off the glass. Off the glass.
translation.zh: 听着…别碰玻璃…

translation.en: And you, open this door.
translation.zh: 还有你 把门打开

translation.en: You forgot the magic word.
translation.zh: 你忘了说那个有魔力的词

translation.en: -Open this damn door. -You just swore again.
translation.zh: -把这个该死的门打开-你刚刚又说脏话了

translation.en: -Lindsey, he just swore again. -So what?
translation.zh: -琳赛 他又说脏话了-那又怎样？

translation.en: -Hey, I'm not playing with you. -You can't make us do anything.
translation.zh: -我没跟你闹着玩-你不能逼我们做任何事

translation.en: Hey, this is my car!
translation.zh: 这是我的车

translation.en: You hear me, little girl? This is my car!
translation.zh: 你听见了吗？小姑娘 这是我的车

translation.en: You better not. Look at me. I'm serious.
translation.zh: 你最好别这样 看着我 我是认真的

translation.en: I'm not playing with you, little girl, okay?
translation.zh: 我没跟你闹着玩 好吗？小姑娘

translation.en: If you don't open up before I count to three...
translation.zh: 如果我数到三你还不开门

translation.en: ...somebody gonna get it.
translation.zh: 就有人要倒霉了

translation.en: One.
translation.zh: 一

translation.en: Two.
translation.zh: 二

translation.en: Three.
translation.zh: 三

translation.en: No! No! Hey, you stop that car!
translation.zh: 不…把车停下

translation.en: Where did he go?
translation.zh: 他去哪了？ （咖啡 卡布奇诺）

translation.en: -Now you gonna get it! -Go! Floor it!
translation.zh: -你要倒霉了 快起来-走 把它撞倒

translation.en: Get out of there! Whoa! Hey!
translation.zh: 快出来…

translation.en: Stop! Wait a minute!
translation.zh: 停 等一下

translation.en: I don't have any insurance on you, girl! Hey!
translation.zh: 我没给你上保险 姑娘

translation.en: Watch where you're going! Watch the spinners!
translation.zh: 看看你在干什么 看看那些轮圈

translation.en: You're messing up my spinners!
translation.zh: 你把我的轮圈都弄坏了

translation.en: -You know how much they cost? -You can't catch us.
translation.zh: -你知道它们要花多少钱吗？-你抓不住我们

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: You little-- Give me them keys!
translation.zh: 你们这些小…把钥匙给我

translation.en: -Dirty sex man. -What y'all think you're doing?
translation.zh: -肮脏的臭男人-你们以为自己在干什么？

translation.en: Let go of my hat! Give me them keys!
translation.zh: -肮脏的臭男人-你们以为自己在干什么？ 放开我的帽子 把钥匙给我

translation.en: Hey, Lindsey, stop this crazy thing!
translation.zh: 琳赛 别闹了

translation.en: That man's setting a bad example for them kids.
translation.zh: 那个人给孩子们做了坏榜样

translation.en: -Wait a minute! -Go! Go!
translation.zh: -等一下-快走

translation.en: Now that's frontier justice.
translation.zh: 这样才公平

translation.en: -Hey, turn up the rear heat. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -把后排的暖气打开-对

translation.en: No. No heat. No talking. You're lucky I'm letting you live.
translation.zh: 不 没有暖气 别说话我让你们活着你们已经很幸运了

translation.en: -But-- -But my butt.
translation.zh: -但是…-但是个屁

translation.en: I should pull off on the side of the road...
translation.zh: 我该这么做 我应该在路边停车

translation.en: ...dig a hole, and bury both you two.
translation.zh: 挖个坑 把你们都埋了

translation.en: That's what I should do. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我就应该这么做 对

translation.en: A hundred years from now, a grizzly will find your bones...
translation.zh: 一百年后 你们的骨头会被棕熊发现

translation.en: ...and pick his teeth with them. Wouldn't like that.
translation.zh: 然后被它吃掉 你们不想这样吧？

translation.en: Can't believe you two. Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你们 你们疯了吗？

translation.en: -We have rights. -No, no, you have no rights.
translation.zh: -我们有人权-不 你们没有人权 在这没有

translation.en: This is my ship, buddy. I'm the CEO of this SUV.
translation.zh: 这是我的船 伙计 我是这辆越野车的总裁

translation.en: Believe that.
translation.zh: 相信我的话

translation.en: Breaker, breaker, 26, this is Big Al out on Highway 5, mile marker 16.
translation.zh: 破坏者…怀疑有罪案 我是大艾尔 在5号高速公路16号里程标记

translation.en: I got two little lambs here been snatched up by the big, bad wolf.
translation.zh: 我看到两只小羊羔被大灰狼劫持

translation.en: I need some backup, pronto.
translation.zh: 我需要后援 赶快

translation.en: Ten-four, Big Al. Let's squash this bug.
translation.zh: 收到 大艾尔 我们碾死这只臭虫

translation.en: You had no consideration for my life, your life or my spinners.
translation.zh: 你们根本没考虑我的生命你们的生命和我的轮圈

translation.en: What? What do you want?
translation.zh: 怎么？你想要什么？

translation.en: I'm driving here!
translation.zh: 是我在开车

translation.en: Mister In-a-Hurry. Idiot.
translation.zh: 急匆匆先生 傻瓜

translation.en: Why is he slowing down?
translation.zh: 他为什么要减速？

translation.en: I don't like this.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这样

translation.en: Pull over right now. Pull it over. Pull it over.
translation.zh: 马上靠边停车 停车…

translation.en: -You better do what he says. -Like hell I will.
translation.zh: -你最好听他的-我才不听

translation.en: I've seen those vigilante trucker movies.
translation.zh: 我看过那些卡车司机义警电影

translation.en: I said, pull over!
translation.zh: 我说了 靠边停车

translation.en: What you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: My paint!
translation.zh: 我的车漆

translation.en: You think you got me boxed in?
translation.zh: 你以为你把我困住了吗？

translation.en: Well, you can kiss my 330 cubic inches of V8 power, sucker!
translation.zh: 尝尝我的5.4升8级变速引擎 蠢货

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 抓紧了

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命

translation.en: Your insurance premiums are going through the roof.
translation.zh: 伙计 你的保险金要突破天际了

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 棒

translation.en: That was so cool!
translation.zh: 这太酷了

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 棒

translation.en: I think I got me some whiplash.
translation.zh: 我觉得我有点拉伤

translation.en: No! No! No!
translation.zh: 不…

translation.en: What was Mom thinking?
translation.zh: 妈妈是怎么想的？

translation.en: I don't know. I like him. He's kind of funny.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我喜欢他 他挺有趣的

translation.en: Hey, don't get soft.
translation.zh: 别心软

translation.en: This man is not our daddy. He's the enemy.
translation.zh: 这个人不是我们的爸爸 他是敌人

translation.en: Take me now! Take me now!
translation.zh: 杀了我吧…

translation.en: This is why we don't come to the city.
translation.zh: 这就是我们不进城的原因

translation.en: Look. Look, man, all I need...
translation.zh: 听着 伙计 我需要的只是

translation.en: ...is four rims and four tires, and I'm gone, I'm out of here.
translation.zh: 四个车辋和四条轮胎 然后我就走…

translation.en: Can you help me?
translation.zh: 你能帮帮我吗？

translation.en: No, I cannot do it. I told you already, the SUV is too big.
translation.zh: 不 不行 我已经说了你的越野车太大了

translation.en: You no listen.
translation.zh: 你没听

translation.en: So look, use smaller ones. Smaller?
translation.zh: -那就用小点的轮胎-小点的？

translation.en: Okay. I put on a smaller tire for you.
translation.zh: 好吧 我给你装小点的轮胎

translation.en: -Good. -Now, you come back Tuesday.
translation.zh: -很好-那你星期二再来吧

translation.en: -What?! -Today is New Year's Eve.
translation.zh: -什么？-今天是除夕夜

translation.en: Time for me to go home. Thanks. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 我该回家了 谢谢 再见

translation.en: See, there's Dad's right there. It's about 30 miles away.
translation.zh: （雷德蒙德） 看 爸爸就在那里大约48公里

translation.en: I'm not walking 30 miles.
translation.zh: 我才不要走48公里

translation.en: Who said anything about walking?
translation.zh: 谁说我们要走路了？

translation.en: But I have to go home. It's New Year's Eve. Dick Clark.
translation.zh: 但我得回家 今天是除夕夜迪克克拉克

translation.en: -Let me just pay you extra. -No, no, no and no.
translation.zh: -听着 我多给你钱-不要…

translation.en: I can make it worth your while. See what I got?
translation.zh: 我会让你觉得值得 看我有什么？

translation.en: Yao Ming. Rookie card.
translation.zh: 姚明 新秀卡

translation.en: Oh, I see. So you think that just because I am Chinese...
translation.zh: 我知道了 你觉得我是中国人所以你就能让我做任何事

translation.en: ...you can get me to do anything.
translation.zh: 你觉得我是中国人所以你就能让我做任何事

translation.en: Hologram.
translation.zh: 全息图

translation.en: My Navigator.
translation.zh: 我的车

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Kevin!
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: Lindsey!
translation.zh: 琳赛

translation.en: Stop playing, because I'm not in the mood!
translation.zh: 别闹了 因为我现在没心情

translation.en: Dad's, here we come.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我们来了

translation.en: Damn! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？

translation.en: Jump! Jump!
translation.zh: 跳下来…

translation.en: You think he can catch us?
translation.zh: 你觉得他能追上我们吗？

translation.en: -Maybe 10 years ago. -Hey!
translation.zh: 也许十年前可以

translation.en: Don't be scared. Just jump.
translation.zh: 别害怕 跳下来就行

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: What's wrong with you kids?!
translation.zh: 你们这些小孩有毛病吗？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Come on. Get! Go!
translation.zh: 快点 跑…

translation.en: Come on, fleabag.
translation.zh: 快跑 慢性子

translation.en: No way!
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: Way! Now, get your narrow butts on this horse now!
translation.zh: 什么？现在快跳到这匹马上来

translation.en: -Hey, how you doing, baby? -Hi. Is everything okay?
translation.zh: -喂？你好吗？亲爱的-你好？一切都还好吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, everything is cool.
translation.zh: 对 一切都好

translation.en: Can I call you right back?
translation.zh: 我能等会打给你吗？

translation.en: Wait, what's that sound? You sound very jiggly.
translation.zh: 等等 那是什么声音？你听起来气喘吁吁的

translation.en: Must be your phone. Everything's cool on this end.
translation.zh: 肯定是你手机的问题 这边一切都好

translation.en: -Are you gonna be here soon? -Sort of. Kind of.
translation.zh: -你们快到了吗？-差不多吧

translation.en: Let me call you back in 10 minutes.
translation.zh: 我十分钟后再打给你

translation.en: Wait, wait, I wanna say hi to the kids.
translation.zh: 等等 我想跟孩子们打个招呼

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: She wanna talk to you guys and make sure everything is all right.
translation.zh: 她想跟你们说话 确保一切正常

translation.en: -Hi, Mom. -Hey.
translation.zh: -你好 妈妈-你好

translation.en: Hi, babies. How are you doing?
translation.zh: 你们好 宝贝们 你们怎么样？

translation.en: -Are you having fun with Nick? -Come on.
translation.zh: -你们跟尼克在一起开心吗？-快点

translation.en: Hit the turbo!
translation.zh: 跑快点

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 快走…

translation.en: I know, baby, but just try to make the best of it, okay?
translation.zh: 我知道 宝贝 尽量好好享受 行吗？

translation.en: -I love you. -Love you too. Bye.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我也爱你 再见

translation.en: -Scoot over, I'm coming aboard. -That's a bad idea.
translation.zh: -躲开点 我要跳上来了-这是个坏主意

translation.en: -Says who? -Says the guy...
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: ...who put all that junk there.
translation.zh: 是把那堆垃圾放在那的人说的

translation.en: Oh, snap!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: I hate horses.
translation.zh: 我讨厌马

translation.en: What take so long? I have to hang mirror ball.
translation.zh: （轮胎和刹车 汽车服务始于1952年） 为什么这么久？我还得挂镜面球呢

translation.en: You little snotty-nosed runts.
translation.zh: 你们这些小畜生

translation.en: I know exactly where you are.
translation.zh: 我知道你们去哪了

translation.en: You messing with Nick the Quick, baby.
translation.zh: 你们在跟快手尼克作对 亲爱的

translation.en: Now's your chance. Hit yourself over the head with a brick...
translation.zh: 现在是你的机会 尼克用砖头在自己头上拍一下

translation.en: ...and say that they were kidnapped.
translation.zh: 然后说他们被绑架了

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: Happy New Year.
translation.zh: -再见-新年快乐

translation.en: You think Nick's okay?
translation.zh: （雷德蒙德货运） 你觉得尼克会没事吧？

translation.en: What are you worried about him for?
translation.zh: 你为什么要担心他？

translation.en: I'm not. It's just...
translation.zh: 我没有 只是…

translation.en: ...maybe we were a little rough.
translation.zh: 也许我们太为难他了

translation.en: Oh, please. That player got what he deserved.
translation.zh: 拜托 他是罪有应得

translation.en: "Get your butts on this horse."
translation.zh: “跳到这匹马上来”

translation.en: "You got $400?"
translation.zh: “你有四百块吗？”

translation.en: I've been thinking. We should've brought soup or something.
translation.zh: 我一直在想 我们应该带点汤来

translation.en: What for?
translation.zh: -为什么？-因为爸爸生病了

translation.en: Because Dad's sick. What is he gonna eat?
translation.zh: -为什么？-因为爸爸生病了 -他要吃什么？-他是爸爸 我相信他有汤喝

translation.en: He's a dad. I'm sure he has soup.
translation.zh: -他要吃什么？-他是爸爸 我相信他有汤喝

translation.en: He must be lonely, living all by himself.
translation.zh: 他一定很孤单 独自一人生活

translation.en: Look, don't bug him about that.
translation.zh: 听着 别跟他说这些

translation.en: If we want him to hook up with Mom, we have to be subtle. Got it?
translation.zh: 如果我们想让他跟妈妈和好我们就要含蓄点 -懂了吗？-懂了

translation.en: I got it.
translation.zh: -懂了吗？-懂了

translation.en: Come on, y'all. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 离开这里

translation.en: Want some chocolate cake? It's world-famous.
translation.zh: 想吃巧克力蛋糕吗？很有名的

translation.en: Mom says I shouldn't have sugar.
translation.zh: 妈妈说我不该吃糖

translation.en: What about you? It'll make your mouth all chocolatey.
translation.zh: 那你呢？这会让你满嘴巧克力

translation.en: No, thanks.
translation.zh: 不 谢了

translation.en: Hey. You forgot something.
translation.zh: 你忘了点东西

translation.en: Sorry about what happened today.
translation.zh: 今天发生的事很遗憾

translation.en: I really wish you guys didn't have to see that.
translation.zh: 我真希望你们没看到那些

translation.en: He used to look at me like that.
translation.zh: 他曾经是那样看我的

translation.en: I know, man.
translation.zh: 我知道 伙计

translation.en: And when he hugged you, you thought he'd never let you go.
translation.zh: 他抱你的时候你觉得他永远不会放手

translation.en: They make you laugh, they tell you they love you...
translation.zh: 他们逗你笑 告诉你他们爱你

translation.en: ...then one day, they never come back.
translation.zh: 然后有一天 他们就再也没回来过

translation.en: I bet you know all about leaving, don't you, player?
translation.zh: 我猜你很了解离开 不是吗？

translation.en: Know what? As a matter of fact, I do.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？其实我真的很了解

translation.en: But only because the same thing happened to me when I was your age.
translation.zh: 但那是因为我在你们这么大的时候也经历过同样的事

translation.en: Yeah, my pops walked out on us too.
translation.zh: 对 我爸爸也抛弃了我们

translation.en: It's a shame that anybody can call theyself a father.
translation.zh: 可惜不管什么人都能当父亲

translation.en: But listen...
translation.zh: 但是听着…

translation.en: ...he's the failure in this, not you.
translation.zh: 他才是失败者 你不是

translation.en: He's the one that's gonna miss out.
translation.zh: 他才是会后悔的那个人

translation.en: I just hope it don't take you guys as long as it took me to figure that out...
translation.zh: 我只希望你们不用像我一样要花那么长时间才能明白

translation.en: ...because it's true. You guys are some cool kids.
translation.zh: 因为这是真的 你们是很酷的小孩

translation.en: There you go. Come on, let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 给你 走吧 我们离开这里

translation.en: -Nick? -What's up, little man?
translation.zh: -尼克？-怎么了？小兄弟

translation.en: If my dad left and your dad left...
translation.zh: 如果我爸爸和你爸爸都离开了

translation.en: ...does that mean I'll end up like you?
translation.zh: 那是不是意味着我以后会跟你一样？

translation.en: I ain't doing too bad. Look, I have blingage.
translation.zh: 我也不是很糟看 我有金灿灿的首饰

translation.en: That's not exactly what I meant.
translation.zh: 我不是这个意思

translation.en: I was watching Oprah, and it was all about how depressed and lonely...
translation.zh: 我看过奥普拉秀 里面都是你这样郁闷孤独的单身汉

translation.en: -...bachelors like you are. -But I'm not depressed or lonely.
translation.zh: 里面都是你这样郁闷孤独的单身汉 但我不郁闷也不孤独

translation.en: -Yes, you are. -No, I'm not.
translation.zh: -是 你就是-不 我不是

translation.en: -Yes, you are. -No, I'm not.
translation.zh: -是 你就是-不 我不是

translation.en: Mom says that if a man is not married by the time he's 35...
translation.zh: 妈妈说如果一个男人35岁还没结婚

translation.en: -...he's either damaged or gay. -What?
translation.zh: -他要么有病 要么就是同性恋-什么？

translation.en: Well, that would explain those earrings.
translation.zh: 这可以解释那些耳环

translation.en: Watch it, sucker.
translation.zh: 说话小心点 混蛋

translation.en: But you do have intimacy issues, don't you?
translation.zh: 你有亲密关系障碍 不是吗？

translation.en: -No, I don't. -Yes, you do.
translation.zh: -不 我没有-是 你就有

translation.en: -No, I don't. -Yes, you do.
translation.zh: -不 我没有-是 你就有

translation.en: Look, it's obvious you need a timeout... ...and you need a little tickle time.
translation.zh: 显然你需要面壁反省而你需要挠痒痒

translation.en: Because all you do is ask a thousand questions, huh?
translation.zh: 因为你们一直在问问题 是吗？

translation.en: Hey. Are you all right?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Kevin.
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: I'm good.
translation.zh: 我没事了

translation.en: -You sure? -Yeah, except...
translation.zh: -你确定吗？-对 除了…

translation.en: -...I'm out. -Okay, don't worry about that.
translation.zh: -我的药用完了-好吧 别担心

translation.en: We'll get you more once we get there.
translation.zh: 等我们到了就去给你买

translation.en: Oh, sure, we can wait...
translation.zh: 当然 我们可以等

translation.en: ...if you want me to die!
translation.zh: 如果你想让我死的话

translation.en: They're closing! Do something, Nick.
translation.zh: 他们要关门了 做点什么 尼克

translation.en: No, no, wait. Hold on! Wait a minute. We need a refill.
translation.zh: 不 等等 等一下 我们要换药

translation.en: Sorry, we're closed. Come back Tuesday.
translation.zh: 不 等等 等一下 我们要换药 -抱歉 我们打烊了 星期二再来吧-但我的孩子生病了

translation.en: But I got a sick kid here.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我们打烊了 星期二再来吧-但我的孩子生病了

translation.en: Look, I couldn't help you even if I wanted to.
translation.zh: 就算我想帮你也帮不了

translation.en: The pharmacist has left for the holiday.
translation.zh: 药剂师去休假了

translation.en: -Well, where is he? -He's off duty.
translation.zh: -他在哪？-他下班了

translation.en: And I doubt very much he's gonna want some guy interrupting his holi--
translation.zh: 我想他不会希望有人打扰他的…

translation.en: Just a second, sir, and I'll draw you up a map.
translation.zh: 等一下 先生 我给你画张地图

translation.en: Hey, Nick, that guy was such a meanie. How'd you get him to do what you wanted?
translation.zh: 尼克 这家伙真小气你是怎么让他听话的？

translation.en: Oh, that was simple. I just gave him the look.
translation.zh: 很简单 我给他看那个表情

translation.en: It works every time.
translation.zh: 每次都有用

translation.en: -It even worked through glass? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -就算隔着玻璃也有用？-没错

translation.en: The look is something I developed when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 那个表情是我小时候发明的

translation.en: I had somewhat of a reputation.
translation.zh: 我名声在外 你知道吗？

translation.en: Surprise, surprise.
translation.zh: 真惊讶…

translation.en: I don't want everybody stepping to me, so I give them the look...
translation.zh: 我不想让人冒犯我 就摆出那个表情

translation.en: ...which told them, "Back off. That's a bad mother--" "Shut your mouth."
translation.zh: 告诉他们“退后 我不好惹闭嘴”

translation.en: I wish I could do that.
translation.zh: 我希望我也能那么做

translation.en: You got somebody bothering you at school?
translation.zh: 为什么？学校里有孩子欺负你吗？

translation.en: An asthmatic in the accelerated program? What do you think?
translation.zh: 他是读加速课程的哮喘病人你觉得呢？

translation.en: Try this. It's foolproof.
translation.zh: 试试这个 非常简单

translation.en: No, no, check the lip, check the lip.
translation.zh: 不 注意嘴唇

translation.en: Man, do not take my lunch money.
translation.zh: 伙计 别把我的午饭钱拿走

translation.en: Here we go, killer. Come on.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 杀手 快走

translation.en: Hey, hey, where y'all going?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪？

translation.en: Excuse me, I'm looking for the pharmacist.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我在找药剂师

translation.en: Delwyn? Sure. He's....
translation.zh: 德尔文？当然 他在…

translation.en: -He's right over there. -That's enough.
translation.zh: -他就在那里-行了

translation.en: -I got it. -Give me that.
translation.zh: -我接到了-把它给我

translation.en: Stop clowning around now.
translation.zh: 别闹了

translation.en: -Yo. -Give me my shoe.
translation.zh: -你好-把我的鞋给我

translation.en: Yo. Excuse me, are you the pharmacist?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你是药剂师吗？

translation.en: Not at the moment. Why?
translation.zh: 现在不是 怎么了？

translation.en: Well, look, I got a kid with me, man. He's got asthma real bad.
translation.zh: 我带了个孩子 伙计他有严重的哮喘

translation.en: Try some steam. That usually helps.
translation.zh: 试试蒸汽 通常都有用

translation.en: Hey, hey. Knock it off.
translation.zh: 放开

translation.en: -Steam? -That's enough of that.
translation.zh: -蒸汽？不-够了

translation.en: Look, look, all I need is a refill, okay? And I know you can help.
translation.zh: 听着 我只是需要换药 好吗？我知道你能帮忙

translation.en: I'm asking you nice.
translation.zh: 我在很有礼貌地求你

translation.en: Mister, I've been married for 38 years. You can't scare me.
translation.zh: 先生 我已经结婚38年了你吓不到我

translation.en: Come on, man, you the pharmacist. I know you took a oath or something.
translation.zh: 拜托 伙计 你是药剂师你肯定发过誓什么的

translation.en: Not that I can remember, no.
translation.zh: 我不记得有这回事 没有

translation.en: Hey, will you go over there and behave yourself?
translation.zh: 你能到那边去好好待着吗？

translation.en: Yeah, go get him over there.
translation.zh: 对 到那边去抓他 （保龄球）

translation.en: You know, folks around here like to barter.
translation.zh: 你知道 这里的人喜欢交易

translation.en: You get what you want, I get what I want.
translation.zh: 你得到你想要的 我得到我想要的

translation.en: One hand washes the other. I scratch your back--
translation.zh: 就像洗手一样 我帮你忙…

translation.en: Get to the point.
translation.zh: 说重点

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, you can't clown me.
translation.zh: 你不能让我当小丑

translation.en: Watch the kids.
translation.zh: 看着孩子们

translation.en: All of them?
translation.zh: 全部吗？

translation.en: You little--
translation.zh: 你这个小…

translation.en: Oh, my word.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Pie and cake and brownies and pie. You said "pie" twice.
translation.zh: -派和蛋糕和布朗尼和派-你说了两次派

translation.en: I like pie.
translation.zh: 我喜欢派

translation.en: Kevin, you know Mom would be upset...
translation.zh: 凯文 你知道妈妈会生气的

translation.en: ...if we were even thinking about trying any of these...
translation.zh: 如果我们想吃这些…

translation.en: ...chocolatey...
translation.zh: 巧克力的…

translation.en: ...creamy...
translation.zh: 奶油的…

translation.en: ...delicious....
translation.zh: 好吃的

translation.en: Hey, I was gonna eat those brownies. What? Just take those.
translation.zh: -我要吃这些布朗尼-什么？拿那些就行了

translation.en: No, I want yours.
translation.zh: 不 我想吃你的

translation.en: Take it easy, man.
translation.zh: 冷静点 伙计

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Ridiculous.
translation.zh: 太荒唐了

translation.en: What? I got this.
translation.zh: 怎么了？我来解决

translation.en: All right, timeout. Get off of him. Get off of him. Get out of here.
translation.zh: 好了 暂停 放开他…

translation.en: Get off of him, you little gangsters. Watch out.
translation.zh: 放开他 你们这些小混蛋 当心

translation.en: You too! Off of him!
translation.zh: 你也是 放开他

translation.en: What is wrong with you kids?
translation.zh: 你们这些小孩有什么毛病？

translation.en: Why y'all ganging up on him?
translation.zh: 为什么都要欺负他呢？

translation.en: You think you so tough?
translation.zh: 你们觉得自己很厉害吗？

translation.en: I'd like to see you try that with somebody my size.
translation.zh: 我想看你们试试我这种体型的

translation.en: Okay! Okay, man!
translation.zh: 好吧…天啊

translation.en: All right, get off me, you little maggots!
translation.zh: 好了 放开我 你们这些小虫子

translation.en: -Do you think we should help him? -I'm getting mad now. Hey!
translation.zh: -你觉得我们该帮他吗？-我要生气了

translation.en: -After this bite. -Hey, that's it.
translation.zh: -吃完这一口-够了

translation.en: Now, I'm gonna count to three.
translation.zh: 现在我数三下

translation.en: Hey, wait a minute!
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Okay! Get off!
translation.zh: 好了 走开

translation.en: My shoe! Come back here with my shoe.
translation.zh: 我的鞋 把我的鞋拿回来

translation.en: All right, people, it's time for some karaoke.
translation.zh: 好了 大家 唱歌时间到了

translation.en: What is she doing?
translation.zh: 她在干什么？

translation.en: She can sing?
translation.zh: 她会唱歌？ 你需要的

translation.en: She can sing.
translation.zh: 她会唱歌

translation.en: Kevin, enough. Kevin, please.
translation.zh: 凯文 够了 凯文 拜托

translation.en: I didn't know you could sing that good. Why you didn't say nothing?
translation.zh: 琳赛 我不知道你唱得那么好 -之前你为什么没说过？-因为之前你是敌人

translation.en: Because before, you were the enemy.
translation.zh: -之前你为什么没说过？-因为之前你是敌人

translation.en: You know who can sing? Galaktico can sing.
translation.zh: 你们知道谁会唱歌吗？银河巨星会唱歌

translation.en: Okay. All right, okay, okay.
translation.zh: 好了…

translation.en: Put that down, settle down and put on your seat belt.
translation.zh: 把它放下 坐好 然后系上安全带

translation.en: I know why your mama won't let you have sugar.
translation.zh: 我现在知道为什么你妈妈不让你吃那么多糖了

translation.en: Hyper down. You're like some kind of crazy dog.
translation.zh: 冷静点 你就像条疯狗一样

translation.en: I know you are, but what am I, Rover?
translation.zh: 我知道你是 但我是什么？狗吗？

translation.en: Nick, I don't feel so good.
translation.zh: 尼克 我感觉不太舒服

translation.en: Do you got anything to drink?
translation.zh: 你有什么喝的吗？

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: I'm sorry, Nick, I accidentally spilled a drop on the floor.
translation.zh: 对不起 尼克 我不小心把饮料洒在地上了

translation.en: Little man, don't even worry about it.
translation.zh: 小兄弟 不用担心

translation.en: There's nothing more that you can do to this car.
translation.zh: 你们没法再破坏这辆车了

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I can't see. I can't see!
translation.zh: 我看不见了 我看不见了

translation.en: Is everybody all right?
translation.zh: 大家都没事吧？

translation.en: I feel much better now.
translation.zh: 我现在感觉好多了

translation.en: Nick, where are my kids? You were supposed to be here two hours ago.
translation.zh: 尼克 我的孩子在哪？你们两小时前就该到了

translation.en: We had a slight delay at the border.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我们在边境耽误了

translation.en: We're gonna need more paper towels.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多的纸巾

translation.en: Paper towels? What's going on?
translation.zh: 纸巾？出什么事了？

translation.en: Nothing. We just pulled over to clean out the Navigator.
translation.zh: 没什么 我们刚刚停车清理一下

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: It's freezing outside, and you've got my kids cleaning your precious car?
translation.zh: 外面这么冷 而你让我的孩子们清理你宝贵的车？

translation.en: Suzanne, it's not like it seems, okay? Well, it sounds pretty bad from here.
translation.zh: -苏珊妮 不是那样 好吗？-我听起来很糟

translation.en: Nick, if you're not here by 8:00, you're gonna be in big trouble.
translation.zh: 尼克 如果你们8点到不了那你就有大麻烦了

translation.en: -Suzanne, I got this. -Eight o'clock, Nick.
translation.zh: -苏珊妮 我能做到-8点 尼克

translation.en: All right, guys, we gotta hustle. Your mom's getting worried.
translation.zh: 好了 伙计们 我们得快点你们的妈妈着急了

translation.en: -But it stinks in here. -Hold your breath.
translation.zh: -但车里还是很臭-屏住呼吸

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: If we don't move...
translation.zh: 如果我们不动…

translation.en: ...maybe it won't kill us.
translation.zh: 也许它就不会杀了我们

translation.en: Oh, man, you're scared of that deer?
translation.zh: 伙计 你害怕那头鹿吗？

translation.en: He ain't gonna hurt you.
translation.zh: 它不会伤害你的

translation.en: They come out of the woods when they get cold. He's probably hungry.
translation.zh: 它们冷的时候就会从森林里出来它可能是饿了

translation.en: Try this.
translation.zh: 试试这个

translation.en: -Hey. Look what I got. -Nick, deers are herbivores.
translation.zh: -看我有什么-尼克 鹿是食草动物

translation.en: So what? Everybody loves chocolate chip.
translation.zh: 那又怎样？所有人都爱巧克力饼干

translation.en: Hey, buddy, come on.
translation.zh: 伙计 过来

translation.en: Cookie.
translation.zh: 饼干

translation.en: Okay, okay, hey, hey, come on.
translation.zh: 好吧…过来

translation.en: -No. -What? He's not gonna hurt you.
translation.zh: -不-怎么了？它不会伤害你的

translation.en: Look, I'm right here with you. Come on, come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 我和你站在一起 过来…

translation.en: Slow. Come on.
translation.zh: 慢点 过来

translation.en: Slowly. Don't scare it. Get in there.
translation.zh: -慢点 别吓着它 过去-如果它发狂怎么办？

translation.en: -What if he's rabid? -Come on, come on. There we go.
translation.zh: -慢点 别吓着它 过去-如果它发狂怎么办？ 快来 我们给它吃 吃吧

translation.en: There you go. There you go.
translation.zh: 快来 我们给它吃 吃吧

translation.en: See, he's gentle. He's not gonna hurt you.
translation.zh: 看 它很温驯 不会伤害你的

translation.en: -Give him another. -No way.
translation.zh: -再给它一块-不可能

translation.en: -Now, look. -Where's my camera?
translation.zh: -你看-我的相机呢？

translation.en: Down, boy. Sit.
translation.zh: 坐下 孩子 坐下

translation.en: Hey, Bambi. Sit!
translation.zh: 斑比 坐下

translation.en: Come on, now. Bambi.
translation.zh: 别这样 斑比

translation.en: Give him the look, Nick! Give him the look!
translation.zh: 让它看那个表情 尼克让它看那个表情

translation.en: All right, you want a piece of me?
translation.zh: 好吧 你想让我揍你吗？

translation.en: Say uncle. Are you done? Your head gotta go over my fireplace?
translation.zh: 叫叔叔 你认输了吗？你想被挂在我的壁炉上吗？

translation.en: -Show him who's boss, Nick. -Now, just let it go.
translation.zh: -让它知道谁才是老大 尼克-放它走吧

translation.en: Let it go.
translation.zh: 放它走吧

translation.en: Now, get your tail out of here before I kick some deer butt.
translation.zh: 在我踢你的屁股之前 赶紧滚开

translation.en: You better run.
translation.zh: 快跑吧

translation.en: -I hope you got some nice shots. -Yep.
translation.zh: 希望你拍到了好照片 -对-现在帮我找我的钥匙

translation.en: Now help me find my keys.
translation.zh: -对-现在帮我找我的钥匙

translation.en: Come on out of there.
translation.zh: 快出来

translation.en: If your mama ever asks...
translation.zh: 如果你妈妈问起来…

translation.en: ...don't let her know I know how to hot-wire a car.
translation.zh: 别让她知道我知道怎短接打火线发动车 好吗？

translation.en: But you don't know how to do it. Quiet down out there.
translation.zh: -但你不知道怎么弄-安静点

translation.en: Have patience.
translation.zh: 有点耐心

translation.en: -Turn it off, Nick! -All right, calm down.
translation.zh: -把它关掉 尼克-好吧 冷静

translation.en: -Hurry up. It's loud. -And scary.
translation.zh: -快点 太吵了-而且很吓人

translation.en: This should do it.
translation.zh: 这样应该就行了

translation.en: -Nick, the car's on fire. It's burning. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: 尼克 车上起火了 它着火了

translation.en: It's gonna burn. Nick, hurry.
translation.zh: -不-它会烧起来的 尼克 快点

translation.en: -Be careful. -Come on, Nick, do it.
translation.zh: -小心点-快点 尼克 快

translation.en: Put it out! Put it out!
translation.zh: 快灭火…

translation.en: It's gonna burn, Nick! Hurry!
translation.zh: 它会烧起来的 尼克 快点

translation.en: This could be toxic.
translation.zh: 这可能是有毒的

translation.en: Worthless.
translation.zh: 没有用

translation.en: -Galaktico! -Kevin, step back. I got it.
translation.zh: -银河巨星-凯文 退后 我来拿

translation.en: Hey, Nick, don't forget me. I'm over here.
translation.zh: 尼克 别忘了我 我在这

translation.en: I'm on the dashboard, remember?
translation.zh: 我在仪表盘上 记得吗？

translation.en: Hey! Don't let me burn!
translation.zh: 别让我被烧死

translation.en: I'm a limited edition!
translation.zh: 我可是限量版

translation.en: Oh, man. I never even got to read the manual.
translation.zh: 天啊 我都没来得及看说明书

translation.en: Hit the dirt!
translation.zh: 快趴下

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: This is about a year's pay.
translation.zh: 这是我一年的收入

translation.en: What did I do?
translation.zh: 我做了什么？

translation.en: What did I do? Why is this happening to me?
translation.zh: 我做了什么？为什么要这样对我？

translation.en: It was you two.
translation.zh: 是因为你们两个

translation.en: If I didn't volunteer to babysit you two little demons...
translation.zh: 如果我没有自愿照顾你们两个小恶魔

translation.en: ...this wouldn't have never happened, and I'd still have my car.
translation.zh: 这些都不会发生 我还能拥有我的车

translation.en: Go ahead and cry. I don't care.
translation.zh: 使劲哭吧 我不在乎

translation.en: Okay, all right, stop the waterworks.
translation.zh: 好吧 好了 别哭了

translation.en: Oh, all right. Oh, come on, come on.
translation.zh: 好了 过来…

translation.en: Stop crying. Stop crying.
translation.zh: 别哭了…

translation.en: It's not your fault. It's not your fault. No, no. I just got a little upset, okay?
translation.zh: 这不是你们的错 不是我只是有点生气 好吗？

translation.en: That's why you buy insurance.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么要买保险

translation.en: All right, let's sit down. Sit down. Come on, now.
translation.zh: 好了 我们坐下…过来…

translation.en: Right here, right here. It's only a car, okay?
translation.zh: 就在这…那只是辆车 好吗？

translation.en: We are a lot of trouble.
translation.zh: 我们很麻烦

translation.en: That's why our daddy doesn't wanna be with us.
translation.zh: 所以我们的爸爸才不想要我们

translation.en: Look at me.
translation.zh: 看着我

translation.en: Don't say that. That's not true.
translation.zh: 别这么说 这不是真的

translation.en: But we destroyed your Navigator.
translation.zh: 但我们毁了你的车

translation.en: That? Oh, that's nothing.
translation.zh: 车吗？那不算什么

translation.en: That's just a material object.
translation.zh: 那只是件东西而已

translation.en: It means nothing.
translation.zh: 不算什么

translation.en: I wouldn't wanna spend New Year's with us either.
translation.zh: 我也不会想跟我们一起过新年

translation.en: Who would?
translation.zh: 谁会想？

translation.en: Me.
translation.zh: 我

translation.en: I would.
translation.zh: 我想

translation.en: But you know what?
translation.zh: 但是你们知道吗？

translation.en: Maybe your mother's right, you know.
translation.zh: 也许你们的妈妈是对的

translation.en: Maybe I'm not cut out for this. I mean, look at you two. You're a mess.
translation.zh: 也许我不适合干这个看看你俩 简直一团糟

translation.en: I keep losing you, feeding you the wrong stuff.
translation.zh: 我总是把你们弄丢给你们吃错的食物

translation.en: If you were goldfish, you'd be dead.
translation.zh: 如果你们是金鱼 你们已经死了

translation.en: You know, you're doing okay. This is just your first day.
translation.zh: 你做得还可以 这只是你的第一天

translation.en: Yeah, you have to get experience. You'll get used to it.
translation.zh: 对 你要积累经验 你会习惯的

translation.en: Yeah, and there's books you can read too.
translation.zh: 对 你还可以看一些书

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: But you know what?
translation.zh: 但你们知道吗？

translation.en: If we're not magically in front of your mother...
translation.zh: 如果我们在接下来半小时内

translation.en: ...in the next 30 minutes or so...
translation.zh: 不能奇迹般地出现在你们的妈妈面前

translation.en: ...she'll never talk to me again.
translation.zh: 她就再也不会跟我说话了

translation.en: Hey, if it's the bottom of the ninth, and you're down two runs, do you quit?
translation.zh: 如果这是第九局的最后时刻 而你已经失败了两次 你会退出吗？
