translation.en: No. You put that ball back on the tee, and you keep swinging.
translation.zh: 不 你会把球放回去 继续挥棒

translation.en: Well, let's keep swinging.
translation.zh: 让我们继续挥棒吧

translation.en: Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 快点 我们走

translation.en: Now we gotta figure out how we gonna get to Vancouver.
translation.zh: 现在我们得想想怎么去温哥华

translation.en: Hey, look.
translation.zh: 看

translation.en: I found your keys, Nick.
translation.zh: 我找到你的钥匙了 尼克

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: It's just my luck.
translation.zh: 这只是我的运气

translation.en: Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: -Come on. -Right here, baby. Come on, now.
translation.zh: -拜托-这里 宝贝 拜托

translation.en: You got one.
translation.zh: 拦下一辆车

translation.en: Oh, man, thanks.
translation.zh: 伙计 谢谢

translation.en: We're on our way to Vancouver, and I really, really appreciate this.
translation.zh: 我们要去温哥华 真的很感谢你

translation.en: I couldn't leave these kids here on the highway.
translation.zh: 我不能让孩子们坐在高速公路边

translation.en: That's why I'm leaving you, you animal!
translation.zh: 所以我要把你扔下 你这个禽兽

translation.en: Wait a minute! Come back here, you hillbilly!
translation.zh: 等一下 -回来 你这个乡巴佬-尼克

translation.en: Come here!
translation.zh: 回来

translation.en: No. Let me in. Let--
translation.zh: 不 让我进去 让我…

translation.en: Hey, yo, bring me back my kids!
translation.zh: 把我的孩子还给我

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 停 （摩托媒体）

translation.en: Mister, are you crazy?
translation.zh: 快点… 先生 你疯了吗？

translation.en: Some psycho trucker took my kids. We gotta catch him.
translation.zh: 有个神经病卡车司机带走了我的孩子伙计 我们得抓住他

translation.en: Well, hop aboard. I'll help you. Ernst to the rescue.
translation.zh: 快上车 我来帮你厄内斯特展开营救

translation.en: Suzanne, they'll be here any minute. I'm sure they're fine.
translation.zh: 苏珊妮 他们随时会来我肯定他们没事的

translation.en: Now, let's concentrate on the party.
translation.zh: 现在我们专心办好聚会

translation.en: We were completely wrong about Nick.
translation.zh: 我们完全错怪尼克了

translation.en: Yeah, but now we know he's kind and gentle.
translation.zh: 对 现在我们知道他善良又温柔

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on. Come on, slim, get me closer.
translation.zh: 快点…小子 离得近点

translation.en: -Come on, Nick. -I got it.
translation.zh: -加油 尼克-好了

translation.en: -Get off. -Open up, you jerk.
translation.zh: -滚开-开门 你这个混蛋

translation.en: Nick, save us! Help!
translation.zh: 尼克 救救我们 救命

translation.en: -Stop this truck! -Get off!
translation.zh: -把车停下-滚开

translation.en: -You lunatic! -Stop this truck!
translation.zh: -你这个疯子-把车停下

translation.en: Kind and gentle, huh?
translation.zh: 善良又温柔是吗？

translation.en: -Go, man. -I'm moving.
translation.zh: -快点 伙计-我在努力

translation.en: This thing wasn't built for speed.
translation.zh: 这车不是图快速的

translation.en: Come on, you're driving like a old lady.
translation.zh: 快点 伙计 你开车就像老太太一样

translation.en: No, no, you watch. Ernst knows how to drive.
translation.zh: 不…你看着 厄内斯特知道怎么开车

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 对…这才像话 伙计

translation.en: -Let us out now. -We wanna go with Nick.
translation.zh: -让我们出去-我们要跟尼克走

translation.en: Let us out.
translation.zh: 放我们出去

translation.en: Come on, slim, don't let him push you around. Do it. Do it.
translation.zh: 快点 小子 别让他把你挤走加油…

translation.en: Dag-bernit, I've had enough of this.
translation.zh: 该死 我受够了

translation.en: -Come on, slim, they getting away. -It won't turn over.
translation.zh: -快点 小子 他们要跑了-它转不过来了

translation.en: I can't do anything about it.
translation.zh: 我没办法了

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Boy, it's true. Never a cop around when you need one.
translation.zh: 天啊 是真的 你需要警察的时候永远都看不见他们

translation.en: What are you doing? Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？你疯了吗？

translation.en: Bad! Hit you!
translation.zh: 坏人 打你

translation.en: -Geronimo! -Geronimo!
translation.zh: 跳吧…

translation.en: -Look, it's Elite Catering. -This is Mom's party.
translation.zh: （冬季狂欢节） -看 是精英餐饮-这是妈妈办的聚会

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: -Come on. -I want some cotton candy.
translation.zh: -快点-我想吃点棉花糖

translation.en: -Got you. -Run! Save yourself!
translation.zh: -抓到你了-快跑 不用管我

translation.en: Wait. Wait.
translation.zh: 等等…

translation.en: At least slow down.
translation.zh: 至少跑慢点

translation.en: You two are a peck of trouble, you know that?
translation.zh: 你俩真是麻烦 知道吗？

translation.en: Wait. I'm trying to protect you.
translation.zh: 等等 我是想保护你们

translation.en: You're going down, sucker.
translation.zh: 你死定了 混蛋

translation.en: Get off me.
translation.zh: 放开我

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 过来…

translation.en: I'm gonna give you a knuckle sandwich.
translation.zh: -尼克-吃我一拳

translation.en: -Let me at him. Get your hands off me. -What's wrong with you two?
translation.zh: -让我收拾他 放开我-你俩有什么问题？

translation.en: -He's a kidnapper! -He's a kidnapper!
translation.zh: 他是绑匪…

translation.en: -He's a kidnapper! -He's a kidnapper!
translation.zh: 他是绑匪… -让我收拾他-对 尼克 打他

translation.en: -Let me at him. -Yeah. Nick, get him!
translation.zh: -让我收拾他-对 尼克 打他

translation.en: Police.
translation.zh: 警察

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: Lindsey, honey.
translation.zh: 琳赛 亲爱的

translation.en: Oh, baby, Mommy was so worried about you. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 宝贝 妈妈太担心你了 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yep. Eight o'clock, just like you said.
translation.zh: 没事 8点 如你所说

translation.en: Now, where is your brother and that Nick?
translation.zh: 你弟弟和那个尼克在哪？

translation.en: I left them by the ice-skating rink.
translation.zh: 我把他们留在滑冰场了

translation.en: Now, I need to know what's going on here, and I want the truth.
translation.zh: 我要知道出了什么事 说实话

translation.en: The truth? I don't think there's time for the truth.
translation.zh: 实话？我觉得没时间说了

translation.en: Get him!
translation.zh: 抓住他

translation.en: I'm the good guy. Get him.
translation.zh: 我是好人 抓住他

translation.en: Get your hands off me, you stinking snowman.
translation.zh: 放开我 你这个臭雪人

translation.en: Wait a minute. You don't understand.
translation.zh: 等一下 你们不明白

translation.en: I got permission from his mother to bring him here. Kevin, tell him.
translation.zh: 是他妈妈允许我带他来的凯文 告诉他

translation.en: Kevin!
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: Let me go. He needs his inhaler.
translation.zh: 放开我 他需要吸入器

translation.en: Kevin. Kevin.
translation.zh: 凯文…

translation.en: Oh, no. Come on, man.
translation.zh: 不 拜托 伙计

translation.en: Come on, Kevin.
translation.zh: 拜托 凯文

translation.en: Come on, man. Breathe.
translation.zh: 拜托 伙计 呼吸

translation.en: Breathe, breathe.
translation.zh: 呼吸…

translation.en: Come on. Come on, breathe.
translation.zh: 拜托 快点 呼吸

translation.en: Kevin.
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: Kevin.
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: Don't you ever scare me like that again. You hear me?
translation.zh: 你别再这样吓我了 听到了吗？

translation.en: Don't you ever do that.
translation.zh: 以后再也别这样了

translation.en: Maybe it won't be so bad to turn out like you after all.
translation.zh: 也许成为你这样的人也没有多糟

translation.en: Kevin!
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: -Mommy. -Oh, Kevin, honey, come here.
translation.zh: -妈妈-凯文 宝贝 快过来

translation.en: I don't know what Mommy was thinking. I should've come home.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我不知道自己是怎么想的我应该直接回家的

translation.en: -Are you okay? -It's okay, Mom. I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-没事 妈妈 我很好

translation.en: Yeah, it's okay. He's fine.
translation.zh: 对 没事 他很好

translation.en: You call this fine?
translation.zh: 你说这样是很好？

translation.en: Look at this. This is a catastrophe.
translation.zh: 看看这一切 这简直是灾难

translation.en: No, Suzanne, you don't understand.
translation.zh: 不 苏珊妮 你不明白

translation.en: -I mean, we-- Me and the kids-- -Nick, please.
translation.zh: -我是说 我们…我和孩子们-尼克 拜托

translation.en: It's bad enough as it is.
translation.zh: 这样已经很糟了

translation.en: I really wanted to believe in you.
translation.zh: 我真的很想相信你

translation.en: Ma'am, did this man have permission to watch your children?
translation.zh: 女士 你允许他照看你的孩子吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: But it was a mistake, and it won't happen again.
translation.zh: 但这是个错误 以后不会再发生了

translation.en: Come on, you guys.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: -Suzanne, no. -But, Mom--
translation.zh: -苏珊妮 不-妈妈

translation.en: I don't wanna hear it. I'm not in the mood to argue. Let's go.
translation.zh: -可是 妈妈…-我不想听 我现在没心情吵架 我们走吧

translation.en: -Mommy. -Let's go.
translation.zh: -妈妈-走吧

translation.en: Suzanne.
translation.zh: 苏珊妮

translation.en: Nick.
translation.zh: （温哥华警察 移动指挥中心） 尼克

translation.en: Listen...
translation.zh: 听着…

translation.en: ...I'm sorry for all the trouble.
translation.zh: 你遇到这些麻烦 我很遗憾

translation.en: If you're serious about heading home, I'd be proud to give you a lift.
translation.zh: 如果你真的想回家我很愿意送你一程

translation.en: Appreciate that, Big Al.
translation.zh: 我很感激 大艾尔

translation.en: I got my truck right--
translation.zh: 我的卡车就在…

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing, you turkey? You can't tow my truck!
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？蠢货你们不能把我的卡车拖走

translation.en: Put it down. I'm here. Put it down right now.
translation.zh: 把它放下 我在这里 快把它放下

translation.en: Officers, arrest this man!
translation.zh: 警官 逮捕这个人

translation.en: Yo, Nick.
translation.zh: 尼克

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 打扰一下

translation.en: Hey, Nick, remember me? I'm in here with a mint stuck to my head.
translation.zh: 尼克 还记得我吗？我的脖子里卡了一枚硬币

translation.en: Hey, brother.
translation.zh: 兄弟

translation.en: What are you moping about? You should be celebrating.
translation.zh: 你在郁闷什么？你应该庆祝

translation.en: You finally got rid of that highfalutin woman...
translation.zh: 你终于摆脱了那个夸张的女人

translation.en: ...with that smart-mouth little girl and that sickly boy.
translation.zh: 还有那个能说会道的小女孩和那个病怏怏的小男孩

translation.en: Yes, sir. It's New Year's Eve, and you are free at last.
translation.zh: 没错 现在是除夕夜而你终于重获自由

translation.en: Time to hit some clubs.
translation.zh: 该去酒吧转转了

translation.en: And they got some foxy ladies here.
translation.zh: 那里有不少漂亮姑娘

translation.en: Did you know Vancouver produces more Playmates...
translation.zh: 你知道来自温哥华的封面女郎 比世界上的其它城市都多吗？

translation.en: ...than any other city in the world?
translation.zh: 比世界上的其它城市都多吗？

translation.en: Let's go, player.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 大玩家

translation.en: Thanks, Dad, that was a lot of fun.
translation.zh: 谢谢 爸爸 真好玩

translation.en: Hey, Nick.
translation.zh: 尼克

translation.en: You know what they call a 50-year-old bachelor?
translation.zh: 你知道人们怎么称呼50岁的单身汉吗？

translation.en: What? Lonely.
translation.zh: -什么？-孤独

translation.en: Who is it?
translation.zh: 是谁？

translation.en: Room service.
translation.zh: 客房服务

translation.en: We didn't order anything, and that won't change.
translation.zh: 我们什么都没要也不是换床单的时间

translation.en: Let me explain, okay?
translation.zh: 让我解释一下 好吗？

translation.en: I know you're upset, and you have a right to be...
translation.zh: 我知道你很生气 你有权生气

translation.en: -...but there's a good reason why all-- -Nick, they're kids.
translation.zh: -但这一切都是有原因…-尼克 他们是孩子

translation.en: They don't need reasons and excuses. They need a man.
translation.zh: 他们不需要原因和借口他们需要一个男人

translation.en: So whatever it is that you have to say, just drop it.
translation.zh: 不管你要说什么 都不用说了

translation.en: I've been down this road before, and I'm not going back.
translation.zh: 我以前走过这条路 我不会重蹈覆辙

translation.en: -Good night. -Wait, wait.
translation.zh: -晚安-等等

translation.en: Just let me say goodbye to the kids.
translation.zh: 就让我跟孩子们道个别

translation.en: I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.zh: 我觉得这不是个好主意

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Make it quick.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: -Nick! -Nick!
translation.zh: 尼克…

translation.en: Hey, how you guys doing? You all right?
translation.zh: 你们好 你们怎么样？还好吗？

translation.en: I knew you'd come back. Lindsey didn't think so, but I did.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会回来琳赛不这么觉得 但我觉得

translation.en: Boy, you know I'm gonna be your friend always, right?
translation.zh: 孩子 你知道我永远都是你的朋友 对吗？

translation.en: But Mama's not gonna date you anymore.
translation.zh: 但妈妈不会再跟你约会了

translation.en: Listen, you guys.
translation.zh: 你们听着

translation.en: Up here.
translation.zh: 坐上来

translation.en: Your mother is a very, very wonderful lady.
translation.zh: 你们的妈妈是个非常棒的女人

translation.en: And she's gonna be dating guys that are much better than me.
translation.zh: 她会跟比我强很多的人约会

translation.en: So you guys gotta stop chasing them off, okay?
translation.zh: 所以你们不要驱逐他们了 好吗？

translation.en: And stay away from their cars.
translation.zh: 还有离他们的车远点

translation.en: Unless they're bulletproof.
translation.zh: 除非那些车是防弹的

translation.en: How do I know we'll ever see you again?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道以后还能否见到你？

translation.en: I got something for you.
translation.zh: 我有东西要给你

translation.en: I want you to hold on to my man Satch, okay?
translation.zh: 我想让你拿着我的朋友萨奇 好吗？

translation.en: That's until I see you again.
translation.zh: 直到我下次见到你的时候

translation.en: All right...
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: ...I gotta get going.
translation.zh: 我该走了

translation.en: Do you have to?
translation.zh: 你真的要走吗？

translation.en: Yeah, little man, I think so.
translation.zh: 对 小兄弟 我觉得是

translation.en: Look, I got one more thing for you.
translation.zh: 我还有东西要给你

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: And for you.
translation.zh: 还有你的

translation.en: Now you have blingage.
translation.zh: 现在你们都有金灿灿的首饰了

translation.en: I love you guys.
translation.zh: 我爱你们

translation.en: See you later, okay?
translation.zh: 再见了 好吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Suzanne, I'm sorry about what happened today.
translation.zh: 苏珊妮 今天发生的事我很抱歉

translation.en: I really am.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: I just wanna know if we can still be friends.
translation.zh: 我只想知道我们还能不能做朋友

translation.en: Nick, I don't think that's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 尼克 我觉得不行了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Nick?
translation.zh: 尼克？

translation.en: We can't be friends...
translation.zh: 我们不能做朋友…

translation.en: ...because I wanna be so much more than just your friend.
translation.zh: 因为我不光想当你的朋友

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes.
translation.zh: 太好了…

translation.en: It's New Year's. Aren't you supposed to kiss her?
translation.zh: 新年到了 你不应该亲她吗？

translation.en: I love a happy ending.
translation.zh: 我爱美好的结局

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 太好了
